name: Age of Enlightenment
description: Shape the destiny of the world as an 18th century ruler. Forge alliances and prepare your armed forces to expand your domain and colonize new lands. Or focus on internal development and help your subjects thrive with prudent economic policy and lawmaking. The choice is yours in Age of Enlightenment!

name: Agents of Spleef
description: A crazy, single- or multi-player spleef game. Die the least amount of times to win.

name: Agnition: Ignis
description: Conjure the fire to solve puzzles of the mountain that holds the salvation of your people in this top-down puzzle game.

name: Agni: Village of Calamity
description: Agni, a determined investigator from a covert Indonesian police unit who defied orders and ventures into a remote village despite ominous warnings. What begins as an unauthorized investigation quickly plunges Agni into a horrifying reality

name: A Gravity Conspiracy
description: A Gravity Conspiracy is a FPS/3D Bullet-Hell game with dynamic gravity. Fight like hell on all surfaces in an intense single player campaign.

name: Aimx
description: Free, easy to use & efficient aim trainer. Improve faster!

name: Aim Assault
description: Step into the nostalgia-fueled world of Aim Assault, the ultimate VR rail shooter.

name: Alchemists
description: Alchemists is a Co-Op horror game that can be played with at least a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 4 players. Your goal is to expel the evil spirit from cursed places by completing the 4 Element ritual. Destroy the monster alone or with your team using your tools.

name: Project Rodeo
description: Project Rodeo is a proof of concept for a 3D platforming adventure game starring Rodeo, a bat living in an old western/steampunk fantasy-styled world who sets out on a grand adventure throughout the known islands. Inspirations for the game include the Mega Man Legends series, Grandia, Tail Concerto and The Legend of Zelda series.

name: Mighty Metas
description: “Mighty Metas” is an action-packed game where players battle using slash, shield slam, and stab moves. Each action has a counter, demanding quick reflexes and strategic thinking. With diverse characters and stunning environments, the game offers fast-paced, thrilling combat that keeps players hooked

name: Rave Rough!
description: Rave Rough is a comedic and chaotic puzzle platformer about chucking your exposable vinyl collection to bounce your way throughout many platforming challenges! All the while butting heads with wacky friends and foes! Levels are very open ended and the moveset compliments this, with you having a lot of freedom to tackle challenges in all sorts of different ways.

name: Karaoke Joysound for Streamer
description:
"Karaoke Joysound for Streamer" offers unlimited singing of tens of thousands of songs that can be live-streamed and video posted!
In addition, there is a scoring game, a singing key change function, and a lyrics message display function, all of which are well-known at karaoke parlors.

name: The Halloween Party
description: Sin descripción

name: Rebellion Stryker
description: Gun your way through this cyberpunk Run-n-Gun with never-before-seen hand-drawn graphics! Pick between two characters and even play co-op in this arcade title!

name: Good Night Pan Pan
description: Explore and investigate the dimly lit halls of a nearly abandoned shopping mall in cyberpunk Hong Kong all while being stalked by a mysterious Yuan Gui, a malevolent spirit hell-bent on taking your soul. Good Night Pan Pan is a short 3rd person survival horror homage to Cantonese horror and culture!

name: Add Town
description: sliding puzzle game

name: Alan Saves Christmas
description: Sin descripción

name: Monsters vs. Aliens: The Mobile Game
description: Monsters vs. Aliens: The Mobile Game is a mobile game based on the movie Monsters vs. Aliens.

name: Floor 9
description: In Floor 9, you find yourself trapped in a mysterious hotel known as "Hotel Liminal." To escape, you must identify anomalies on each floor. These anomalies can be anywhere - on the ground, in paintings, or even right in front of your eyes. You must check every corner carefully, as one mistake will send you back to the beginning, to Floor 9. The game offers you a unique blend of eerie atmosphere, puzzle-solving, and survival, all wrapped up in a psychologically thrilling experience.

name: Alice in Maniacland
description: Sin descripción

name: Internet: legko i prosto!
description: The Internet is really easy and fun! It's full of fun adventures, and you'll learn how to navigate the global network with familiar characters like Globi and his companions. You'll explore the magical world of the Internet, learn how to use browsers and email, and understand the basics of online security.

name: Flippee Ball
description:
A minimal, 1-button, 2-player game of maximal skill where pinball meets basketball.

Learn the shots, practice against the AI then challenge your family and friends.

A single button flips your flippers but gives you precise control of your shots. Master your timing, improve your reactions to your opponent, learn all the tricks and develop your own techniques until the ball is under your control and scoring becomes second nature.

Whether you're a casual gamer or a competitive player, Flippee Ball offers a satisfying experience that's easy to pick up but hard to master. Download now and start your journey to becoming a Flippee Ball champion.

name: Sonic Grind
description: Sin descripción

name: Detariki Z
description: Detariki Z is a “girl and jammer cooperative RPG”.

name: Sonic Into Cyberspace
description: Sonic Into Cyberspace is a 2D modern Sonic game that aims to evolve and expand upon the 2D Sonic formula. This game places an emphasis on freedom of movement and flow, maintian high speeds to enter boost mode to go even faster and collect rings to reduce the amount of time to enter boost mode.

name: Sonic Jam Game.com Remake
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Magenta
description: Sonic Magenta is a free 2D Sonic the Hedgehog fan game made by Scorbunny Channel.

name: Trailer Park Tycoon: Raccoon Ranch
description: One of the key elements of the game is your production. However, instead of the usual vegetables, pies, and trinkets, you're engaged in growing tobacco, brewing alcohol, and producing goods available only to adults. In addition, you can produce coffee, soda, and energy drinks. All of this can be sold in your store!

name: Sonic Momentum
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Re;Velocity
description: A 2D Sonic fan game with a heavy focus on high-speed momentum and stupidly fast platforming, with a simple control style, a unique gameplay style and a strange emphasis on going as fast as hedgehogly possible.

name: Chrono Crimes
description: Mystery-Time Travel Deduction Game with Stealth & Puzzles

name: Mega Man III Ultimate
description:
Mega Man III Ultimate is a rebalance of the game's level designs, with special attention paid to the Doc Robot and Wily stages, extending from kuja killer's Mega Man 3 Improvement hack and serving as a predecessor to the TheSkipper1995's later Mega Man 3 Revamped.

Between the revamped difficulty and inclusions of kuja killer's improvements, Mega Man III Ultimate is "how Mega Man III should have been back in 1990".

name: Shmoupity Shmoup
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Return of Fire Breath
description: Sin descripción

name: Wonder Zoo: Animal Rescue!
description:
Be the animal zoo keeper and take care of pet animals in zoo park craft life.
Start your duty as a zookeeper and take care of pet world in the wonder animal zoo to explore the life of zoo life in this animal park game along with zoo tycoon games and addictive tasks as a animal guardian in this zoo animal games.

name: Extreme Air Snowboarding 3D
description: You have to take part in competitions in extreme winter sport. You can choose kind of competitions. It can be downhill, slalom or you can do various tricks in freestyle. No matter what kind of tournament you choose, you will enjoy excellent 3D graphics in all of them!

name: Sonic Skyfall
description:
From Stick Drift Studios comes Sonic Skyfall, a brand new Sonic fangame being made with the Infinity Engine framework, taking inspiration from Unleashed, Colors, Generations, and Frontiers! The very first demo is now playable, featuring the first 4 levels of the game. Each can be played as either Sonic or Shadow, and both hedgehogs have their own collectibles to find. Explore the Atlas Sky Islands in Nanite Nimbus Zone and enter the Liminal Spaces: pocket dimensions that somehow emits familiar energies.

Both Hedgehogs each have one new ability/quirk added to them to mix things up a little. Sonic still has his Bounce Bracelet as his Air Special, but can now also utilize a new Ground Special Ability called the Cylaunch. As the name implies, it is based on the Cyloop from Sonic Frontiers, except it sees Sonic instantly launching himself high into the air, while also being able to take out closeby enemies on the ground. This ability will drain 10 units of Sonic's Boost/Energy Meter, so use it with caution! Shadow's Chaos Control is his Special Ability, which also costs 10 Energy. Not only does Shadow slow down time, but he also reduces his own gravity by a very noticeable amount. With proper use of this perk, Shadow can reach unthinkable heights while cutting down times! Both characters can also fire a projectile that seeks closeby enemies at the cost of 3 Energy. Shadow will fire a Chaos Spear, and Sonic will launch a Sonic Boom Shockwave.

name: Sonic Sunsation
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Tameshi
description:
Sonic Tameshi is a Classic Sonic Fan Game created on the Sonic Worlds engine.

The game's story follows Sonic after he finds out about Dr Eggman's new plan to extract all the natural resources from an Mystical island. Face Metal Sonic and save the island, stop Eggman from building the Pleasure Island Theme Park and save the beautiful paradise hidden on the other side of the sea. Sonic will feature the Drop Dash, Insta-Shield, Peel Out and a Wall jump!

name: Disney Speedstorm: PlayStation Plus Exclusive Pack
description:
This pack includes:
- Baloo Wildboost Logo Avatar
- Baloo Sterling Legacy Suit
- Baloo Wildboost Sterling Edition Livery

name: Sonic UltraSaturn
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Unleashed +
description: Sonic Unleashed + (Plus) is a sonic fan game that aims to port Sonic Unleashed to PCs.

name: Dead Island 2: Neighborhood Watch
description: Patch 6 will introduce all Dead Island 2 players to the Neighborhood Watch game mode, a new cooperative horde mode, in which players will have to work together against swarms of zombies, including a new way to strategize against the undead.

name: Sonic Velocity
description: Sonic Velocity is a 3D Boost formula hedgehog game in the vein of Sonic Unleashed and Generations.

name: Sonic X TMNT: Score Party
description: Sonic X TMNT: Score Party is a collection of mini-games featuring classic Sonic and teenage mutant ninja turtles from the animated show from the 80s! In these mini-games you will need to collect a certain number of points. Their total number is rated S or D rank, depending on how many points you have collected. In this demo, you will be able to run at super sonic speed as Sonic and kick some shells as Leonardo! At different levels from the games of both franchises, you will meet Dr. Eggman's badniks and Shredder's foot soldiers (and not only)!

name: Sonic: The Secret Tracks
description:
It's time to get Funky!

Sonic and Secret Tracks is a Sonic themed overhaul of the popular Rhythm Game of Friday Night Funkin. A collaborative effort between Sonic fans in order to bring a fun, radical experience by the mania for the mania.

name: Debut Project: Cooking Cafe
description:
As a new cafe employee, you’ll be taking orders and completing challenges on your journey to create recipes which will take social media by storm. Share pics of your cooking to get Likes and boost your cafe’s rating. See if your culinary creativity can earn a million followers for the cafe!

Create up to 80 different menu items in the cafe kitchen! Experience the joys of cooking though 13 minigames in which you’ll choose flavors, toppings, and more!

name: Endeavor
description:
Endeavor is a 3D Space Adventure.
Explore, investigate, gather, build and battle your way through the unknown frontiers of infinite space-time.

name: Werewolves Revenge
description:
Werewolves Revenge is a first person social deduction game where your voice is your greatest weapon.

The Town must work together to identify and eliminate the Werewolves before it's too late..

The Werewolves secretly meet at night, allowing them to scheme and attack a player.

Neutrals, loyal only to themselves, find their place in the chaos.

Played by up to 16 Players, games are filled with deceit, murder and plot twists.

name: Native Isekai Defense
description: As part of the Pioneer Corps, form a party with other players and take on missions to protect humanity's last remaining land and reclaim the contaminated territories from the enemies!

name: Punch Monkey
description: You're a broke loner who lives in a crappy apartment. Crime, drugs and alcohol run rampant in your neighborhood. You dream of a better life but it's out of reach. That is, until you see an ad on TV for a big fight with a cash prize! You set out to claim the prize, but you have to make your way through hordes of unsavory crackheads and worthless bums. Are you up to the challenge?

name: Roll'N With Da Punchez
description:
"Roll'N With Da Punchez" is a stylistic, physics-based platformer with a unique twist! Punch a ball through challenging obstacle courses, and reach the goal as fast as possible!

But stay alert of your surroundings, as one wrong move could send the ball plummeting back down!

Don't let that get you down though! Roll With The Punches and Try Again!

name: Ignited Entry
description: Ignited Entry is a full length narrative driven psychological horror game with voice acting, dreamish visuals, and horror elements that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

name: Looking Up I See Only A Ceiling: The Relapse
description:
After experimenting surreal visions in her ceiling, a stressed student discovers that life is not always a relaxing journey. Exams are not over: reality demands more psychological efforts to overcome new problems.

Enjoy this new story of “Looking Up I See Only A Ceiling” and live the life of a student trying to fight anxiety, stress and overthinking.

name: The Catapult
description:
The Catapult you must help the stickman defend his castle from the siege weapons of the enemy.

Use the catapult to throw stones at the opponents and break their military mechanisms and siege towers.

The game has a simple intuitive control.
Tap on the screen and pull to charge the catapult and select the tension force. Release to launch the projectile into the enemy.

For each struck enemy you will earn coins which help you to buy upgrades shells, for example a bomb.

name: Rolling Ball Game DX: Director's Cut
description: Rolling Ball Game returns with Rolling Ball Game DX: Director's Cut! Traverse through obstacles and avoid the capsule-bots trying to knock you off the stage. Featuring all new and remastered levels, alongside extra content.

name: Making a Monster
description:
Loupe is an aspiring witch who wants to make an elaborate training dummy to help them hone their magic skills. Instead, they make something worse.

A micro visual novel about facing your worst enemy.

name: Knight Legacy
description: A new journey across the Kingdom Of Kavasia awaits you in Knight Legacy! Become a true knight, fight against evil foes and help people with many side quests.

name: Runaway Star
description: Runaway Star is a classic turn-based RPG inspired by games like Pokemon Mystery Dungeon and Final Fantasy. Explore the world of Raffelsia where falling stars with dangerous monsters inside have begun to plague the region. Join a team of adventurers called the Diurners and work together with new friends to uncover the source of the phenomenon and bring a stop to it.

name: Border Patrol
description: Border Patrol is a 2D comic-style simulation game where players take on the role of a border officer responsible for inspecting incoming and outgoing vehicles, searching for contraband, and dealing with corruption and forgery.

name: Smitty 2
description: Smitty 2 brings back the adorable platforming adventure into a brand new level! Walk, hop and sprint through the interconnected areas around Dripsdale and search for Dropple Capsules and Energy Pellets scattered throughout.

name: MechWarrior 2: BattlePack
description: BattlePack is the re-release of MechWarrior 2, its first expansion and multiplayer ported to Mercenaries' engine.

name: Akira GBC
description: A Remake of Akira (Famicom) exclusively for Gameboy Color featuring some new content. Hours of heart pumping visual novel action! Play online or download for free.

name: Yoru no Kasou
description:
I walk around.
Sometimes something falls down.
Burn it.
There are 30 △ in total.
It's just a game of exploration.
There is no story.

name: Alone Among The Stars
description:
Alone Among The Stars is a tabletop roleplaying game by Takuma Okada about exploring space and experiencing wondrous sights.

The original pen-and-paper game uses a dice and a deck of cards to present the player with prompts for solo RPG journaling. This port replaces the dice, cards, and written rules with a Nintendo Game Boy or your web browser, but you'll need to bring your own pen and paper.

If you've never played a solo RPG before, it can seem awkward at first, but go with it; it can be really rewarding. For more info on solo RPGs and how to play them, Dicebreaker made a great guide.

If you wish to support this game, please consider donating to the original project.

name: Sollire
description: Sollire is a Gradius-style Shoot Them Up combined with bits and pieces inspired by Sonic, Megaman and Zelda.

name: Final Fantasy IV: Daughter of Darkness and Light
description:
What if the King of Baron had banished Joanna rather than Cecilia? That Kluya meets Joanna, the two fall in love, and they have a son and a daughter? And that, after tragedy strikes, this daughter ends up been abandoned in the woods… only to be found and raised by the King?

A single ripple becomes a wave that sends a pair of lovers down vastly different life paths. Cecil, the White Wizard. Rosa, the Dark Knight. This is her story–one of redemption from the darkness within.

'Final Fantasy IV: Daughter of Darkness and Light' is a fork of the 'Project II: Final Fantasy IV' hack. Not only does it include the bugfixes, restoration of missing content and revised script of the latter mod, but it also an alternate story with Rosa Farrell as the protagonist.

name: Stealth The Hedgehog
description: This game is an experimental 3D platformer with weird references and other random stuff.

name: Super Mario Bros. RMX
description: Sin descripción

name: A Dark Winter Wander
description:
This is a short Christmas game for Game boy. It's about Embla and how she tries to handle the holidays and her strained relationship with her family. She's drawn into a twilight world of spirits where she undertakes a mysterious year walk, where she might get perspective on things or not.

It's up to you.

name: Speedy the Rollerskater: SMS Edition
description: Speedy the Rollerskater SMS Edition is a demake of Speedy the Rollerskater using the Open Surge Engine. Besides fixing some issues of the original version, Speedy SMS Edition offers a 'What If' scenario...

name: Super Mario Land 2 + Wario's Conquest
description:
Super Mario Land 2 is back!
Relive the golden days in this remake of a classic- spiced up with lots of new features!

name: Speel
description: Speel is an experimental typing game that plays a little more like a puzzler. Your job is to type words incorrectly on purpose.

name: First Strike Still Deadly
description: A set of 3 Limit Removing Levels for Doom 2.

name: Starbot: Asvertichaos
description: Starbot: Asvertichaos is a fast-paced 2D platformer focused on fluid movement. Explore the continent of Asvertica and uncover its secrets as you explore every crack and crevice while meeting a wacky set of characters to find your friend!

name: Stardust the Unicorn
description: A small platformer inspired by old-school speed games. Help Stardust rescue his friends from the Kelpie Kingdom using his speed, horn, and magic dusts that grant him different abilities. Jump around, run, and use your abilities to advance through the levels. Watch out for obstacles and use different dusts to help you progress. Different dusts grant you different powers, which you can use to your advantage. Try them all and use your favorite one.

name: Sunrise Doll
description: Sunrise Doll is a single-screen 2D game in which you control the swordsman known as Pawn. The goal of the game is to clear all levels in a sequence. To clear a level, Pawn must defeat all enemies in the level. To defeat an enemy, Pawn must use her sword to reflect projectiles back at it, and then collect its soul. There are various enemies that have different behaviors.

name: Super Freaks 1: Ultimate Edition 3.0
description: An update for Super Freaks 1: Ultimate Edition 3.0 that triples the content of the game, adding The Uncle Swordsman Story, with faster-paced gameplay, and a set of new bosses to go with it!

name: Super Freaks Arcade
description: Super Freaks Arcade is a throwback to single-screen arcade games, loosely based on a combination of Mario Bros., and Pac-Man Championship Edition. It aims to reinterpret the gameplay of Super Freaks 1 Ultimate Edition as if it were a 1983 arcade game. While it was originally made in two weeks for the Freakjam 1 pack, Super Freaks Arcade is receiving content updates and overhauls over time that will continue to expand it.

name: Obama 2048
description: Obama 2048 is a clone of 2048 featuring the former president Barack Obama.

name: 2048 Attack on Titan
description: A 2048 clone based on the anime and manga "Attack on Titan" released on iOS devices. The game features 4x4, 5x5 and 6x6 boards.

name: 2048 3x3 4x4 5x5 6x6 7x7 8x8 9x9 10x10
description: 2048 3x3 4x4 5x5 6x6 7x7 8x8 9x9 10x10 is a 2048 clone game which adds in various different modes into the game which increase the size of the game board.

name: 2048 11x11
description: Swipe the tiles and get to the 2048 tile within a 11x11 board.

name: Super Freaks Presents: Strato Freaks 2
description: Sin descripción

name: 2048 12x12
description: Swipe the tiles and get to the 2048 tile within a 12x12 play field.

name: Super Freaks Side Story: Scruffy Minus - The Rise of the Anti-Freaks
description: Bringing back the gameplay style of Scruffy 3: A Day in the Life, Scruffy Minus is a new platforming adventure (with some freaky surprises!) Run, jump, and activate your different superpowered Suits, to kick butt!

name: Sudoku
description: Train and release your stress with sudoku for iOS devices.

name: Super Infiniboss: The Gauntlet
description: Super Infiniboss: The Gauntlet is an endless boss battle arcade platformer. It's about you, an ever-changing boss, and tons of projectiles. Choose a character, get as many points as you can, and work towards unlocking more characters.

name: 20 Sector Challenge CBP
description: The 20-sector Community Build Project somehow managed to be in development for seven years despite its simple concept: each participant was limited to 20 sectors per turn, but he could take any number of turns.

name: Bubble Aim
description: Bubble Aim is an exciting game where bubbles of various colors and sizes descend from the sky. The player must shoot these bubbles, causing them to either burst or split into smaller bubbles. Each successful shot earns the player points. The objective is to shoot as many bubbles as possible without letting them fall to the ground. The game is endless, challenging players to achieve the highest score possible by continuously popping bubbles. How many bubbles can you shoot?

name: Alpha Dog
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Nova
description: Welcome to Super Nova! A 2D fast-paced platformer with emphasis on keeping your speed, quick combat, and bosses that will keep you on your toes to beat 'em up!

name: SplatShop-2D Thunderstorm
description: SplatShop-2D, a young game developer, finds Castlestorm, a highly-ambitious yet unreleased old game. However, the game was slowly being corrupted by assets from other games, so 2D solves it the only way he can... Mass Destruction!!

name: Resplendent
description: This game is a delightful blend of pixel art and fast-paced gameplay.

name: Obduracy
description: This game is a pixelated adventure where you play as a gun-toting explorer.

name: Halfling
description: An open world cozy fantasy rpg. Farm, adventure, smoke pipe weed, and live the life of a Halfling.

name: Paratroopers Raid
description: In this exciting shooting game, highly trained paratroopers are sent off in waves to destroy your base. Evolve your base and weapons with each turn to fight stronger enemies. Control your weapons, adjust your aim, clear the sky of enemies, evolve and have fun.

name: Investigation
description: Investigation is a singleplayer body-cam styled psychological horror game about searching for clues and answers while a demonic killer brings these gruesome victims back to life in terrifying ways. Solve the puzzles or be consumed by them....

name: Hydra
description: Hydra is a detective game with survival horror elements. You have been sent to the island of Kanaan to find an abandoned research facility of the "Third Reich". The island is also a place where terrifying creatures come out of the dark sea.

name: Shadow Dash
description: Shadow Dash is a retro 2D action platformer with pixel-art characters on oil painting backgrounds and changing game controls.

name: Hit of Chernobyl
description: Hit of Chernobyl is a Survival FPS. The action takes place in the Zone, which was heavily polluted after a mysterious disaster. Marauders, journalists and just adventurers began to illegally enter the Zone. Many of them disappeared without a trace, and some lucky ones returned with unique artifacts.

name: Persephone
description: Persephone is a dream-inspired, unique approach to first-person survival horror. With no weapons to attack, you'll need to utilize your environment in order to survive. When your surroundings won't save you in some scenarios, the only option is to run and redirect the threat.

name: Elite Hacker: Retro Hacking Evolution
description: Do you ever lay awake at night thinking about Zero Cool wearing the dress?

name: Hide and Seek with Noah
description: Where children's games take a captivating turn. A point and click adventure game where you play hide and seek with your friend Noah!

name: Endme
description: An indie game in which one IT guy is about to lose himself. He worked hard but his director canceled all that was done. Be careful! You'll need to shoot, jump and go through the consciousness thorns of our character to the end!

name: Math Seeker
description: Push the boxes and solve the math puzzles! Here, you will enjoy the charm of math seamlessly woven into the gameplay. A variety of boxes and mechanisms infused with mathematical elements await your discovery. Unleash your wit, unravel the game's secrets, and claim the crown of math!

name: Girlvania Expansion Pack: Legs & Feet
description: Sin descripción

name: Minecraft, But If You Touch Grass You Die
description: Minecraft, but if you touch grass you die is a challenge mod for Minecraft based on the traditional children's game the floor is lava, in which the grass block deals damage to the player.

name: Deal or No Deal: Electronic Personald Hand Held Game
description: Deal or No Deal: Electronic Personald Hand Held Game is a LCD game based on the original 2003-2013 Australian adaptation of Deal or No Deal.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010
description: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010 is a Java mobile game based on the Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? series.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010: Part 2
description: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010: Part 2 is a Java mobile installment of the TV series of the same name, and also the second part to Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2010.

name: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2011
description: Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? 2011 is the 2011 installment of J2ME games based on the Who Wants To Be A Millionaire? TV series.

name: Is It Woke?
description: Is It Woke? is a browser game where one has to guess wither or not a video game is considered "woke" or not based upon a spreadsheet created by the Steam group Woke Content Detector. The player gets a point every single question in a they get right, however if they get one wrong, they lose a point.

name: Mysterious House
description: a mysterious house waits you!

name: Blob the Klex
description: Step into paws of Klex and use your cat powers to explore the charming town of Katzburg in this 3D platformer, Blob The Klex!

name: Infinity Wanderer
description: Infinity Wanderer is a roguelite, souls-lite action-platformer. Players dive into Lunara's dark story, facing her fears in a nightmare world. With handcrafted levels and deep character customization, it offers fluid, challenging combat that blends fast-paced and strategic souls-like mechanics.

name: Amon Ra
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Sonic Battle
description: Full fledged Sonic Fighting game - Super Sonic Battle. Developed to celebrate the 20th Anniversary of the GBA title Sonic Battle!

name: The New Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog
description:
The New Adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog is a fangame based on Sonic Cartoons & Archie Comics.
The Game itself takes place in a special Alternate Universe where elements of all three shows (SatAM, AoStH & Underground) co-exist in some kind of fashion. You have a choice to play through 3 zones in this demo; Peridot Coast (a beach in Mobius best known for it's unusual green sand), Marble Valley (a canyon filled with volcanic geysers) & Robotropolis (an industrial city & Primary headquarters of Bumbling villain Dr. Robotnik & his Super Sonic Search & Smash Squad!

name: The Noise's Jam-Packed Radical Mini Mayhem!
description: The Noise, being the annoying gremlin he is, decided to shrink himself down and go for a "jog" in Peppibot Factory.

name: Transylmania Deluxe: SAGE 2024 Edition
description:
Sneak into the Bubble Gum Factory with the new Bubble Gum Run mode!
This is a special version of Transylmania Deluxe made for SAGE 2024!

Your castle has been invaded by pesky villagers! To save yourself (and to get some rest) jump on top of their heads or run into them from behind and turn them into the walking dead!
To get to the next level, open your coffin by snagging all of the villagers, and get in before the sun rises!
Watch out for fire, water, sunlight and spikes!

name: Trio Triado The Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Ultimate Sonic Fighter
description: Sin descripción

name: Ultimate Sonic Fighter Remaster
description: Ultimate Sonic Fighter Remaster is a reformulation of the old Ultimate Sonic Fighter fangame released at Sage in 2017. The game has improved both its hud and its structure. The new Ultimate Sonic Fighter has extra modes and even a Tag battle system that was introduced in its sequel.

name: Variable Geo vs. Asuka 120%
description:
Variable Geo vs. Asuka 120% is a crossover fighting game with characters from Variable Geo and Asuka 120%. Here everything will be standard as in many fighting games, but with differences. For example, some characters from Asuka 120% received new specials and improved supers that differed from the original. Here you will find a couple of mini-games, several additional modes and the ability to play online multiplayer (Network). Have fun in team mode and tag team mode, compete with each other in local or online, practice in training mode and free match. Whatever you want, there are not many modes, but there are enough of them. It is well suited for both tournaments and online gatherings.
Choose your fighter from your favorite fighting series and go to battle!!

name: Yo! Noid 4: Episode 3
description:
The Noid is back in the long-awaited final episode of Yo Noid 4.

The Noid, and his Sidekick Pepe the Pepperoni, journey to Pepe's home planet: The Domino's Pizza Planet, to save it from enslavement from an insane Hatsune Miku who is threatening to put pineapple on every pizza.

This game is pulled from a world where Domino's Pizza's mascot "The Noid" became the hit platforming sensation rather than Sonic the Hedgehog. Including having Yo! Noid 4 having it's third episode released!

name: Supra Smash Bross Devolution 2.22: You Can (Not) Be Serious
description:
Supra Smash Bross Devolution is a satirical take on the Smash Bros. series, with hilariously terrible graphics yet surprisingly deep gameplay.

A decade-long project, Bross' newest update celebrates its past with a complete remake of its very first iteration included.

To celebrate the 10-year anniversary of the Supra Smash Bross games, a full remake of Supra Smash Bross Mayday is contained within Devolution. It can be accessed via the Vault menu.

name: ClickCatToe
description:
Cat Clicker

Welcome to Cat Clicker! This addictive and fun game tests your reflexes and clicking skills. The goal is simple: click on the cat to collect points and activate bonuses. Featuring a retro 8-bit design and vibrant music, Cat Clicker offers a casual gaming experience perfect for all audiences.

name: Proto Sonic
description: Sin descripción

name: Skyfarm
description: Skyfarm is a cozy single-player 3D farming simulation game, set on a post-apocalyptic rooftop and based on permaculture principles. Tend to your garden and create self-regulating ecosystems to harvest food and increase biodiversity. Talk to fellow rooftop gardeners and unlock new elements.

name: Skill Legends Royale
description: This is a free multiplayer PvP strategy game that incorporates rogue-like and auto chess elements, players need to equip their auto-battling heroes with the right treasures and skills to ultimately defeat all other players and become the champion.

name: Hooked On Speed
description: Race through 24 thrilling levels in Hooked On Speed! Use speedboosts, jumpboosts, and a grappling hook to hit checkpoints and finish the level as fast as possible. Unlock medals by beating record times, how fast can you go?

name: Mordeth
description: Sin descripción

name: Time of Sorrow
description: Sin descripción

name: Same Room Same Day
description: Step into the mind of Rosaline in this psychological horror FPS. Face terrifying manifestations of her fears, battle through intense combat, and help her find inner peace. Solve puzzles along the way to unlock deeper layers of her psyche and bring her closer to healing

name: Digdig
description: A casual game where you turn a crank and dig the ground more and more!

name: Welcome to Sushi Tree
description: A fast paced game inspired by Wario land 4 and pizza tower that puts a lot of focus on story and uniqueness of each level.

name: Scouter
description: Welcome to Scouter! A fast-paced action platformer oozing to the brim with 90's anime goodness! This is a really fast-paced action game where your goal is to get to the end and fight as many enemies (and be as stylish) as you possibly can!

name: Synthrome
description: Inspired by the iconic games of the early 2000s, particularly those known for their fast-paced momentum and intricate platforming, Synthrome offers a fresh twist on the genre while maintaining the adrenaline-pumping gameplay fans of the genre love.

name: Superguy and Megaboy
description: Superguy and Megaboy is a high-speed, free-roam platformer that is somewhere between 2.5D and 3D. Players can attack only on a 2D axis but otherwise move freely in 3D. Attacks will only hit their targets if they are positioned at roughly the same 3D depth.. meaning if you see a bad guy in the distant background, you won't be able to hit him (or vice versa) unless you move up close!

name: SyS KillMirror
description: An exploration FPS set on a fake planet called SyS, ruled by the cat named Emperor, will you be able to escape this cursed realm?

name: Deer Avenger 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Vampire Survivors: Space 54
description: The 1.9 update for Vampire Survivors adds a new stage, Space 54, and new weapons and character inspired by the original VS framework, Phaser. Some bat content also is part of the update.

name: Vampire Survivors: The Darkasso
description: The 1.11 update for Vampire Survivors adds The Darkasso, a new deck of Arcanas to be collected and used during runs. It also adds character skins, unlocked as final prizes for the main game Adventures.

name: Pokémon Go: Max Out
description: The 16th implementation of seasons intersected with the Autumn season in Northern Hemisphere and Spring season in the Southern Hemisphere. This season's theme is focused around the Dynamax feature and the Pokémon of Galar.

name: Fire Emblem: Dream of Five - Definitive Edition
description:
Dream of Five was an FE7, FEditor-era hack made in the early 2010s by a team of teenagers with too much time on their hands. For years, it has remained dormant, collecting cobwebs as the hacking scene advances in leaps and bounds.

Until now.

name: War Thunder: Ancient Helicopter Snail Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Apex Legends: PlayStation Plus Play Pack
description:
Join the Apex Games ready for battle with the PlayStationPlus Play Pack. This collection of content will trick out specific weapons and Legends in special gear.

This pack includes:
-2 character skins (Loba & Wattson)
-2 weapon skins (30-30 Repeater , C.A.R.)
-2 banners (Loba & Wattson)

name: Brawlhalla: Bonus Pack 14
description:
This pack includes:
• Forsaken Magyar Skin
• Magyar Legend Unlock
• Nightmare Mauler Hammer Skin

name: TeknoKinetica
description:
High speeds and faster times are the name of the game! TeknoKinetica is a 2D speed-running oriented platformer built for those who like to retry and optimize! Utilize the power of Parries and Rhythm to blitz through bite-sized stages in speed and style!

You'll need a good dose of speed and quick-wits to make it through with a high rank. Think you got what it takes, accelerator?

name: Tricky and the Dream Caster
description: Tricky and the Dream Caster is a movement-centered collectathon that aesthetically takes after Sega's ill-fated final home console. Control Tricky O'Possum and his new morally ambiguous pal Volt as they traverse the astral plane to break free of Dream Caster's curse!

name: Super Nario World
description: Super Nario World is a hard 10 level rom hack which is centered around vanilla Super Mario World mechanics.

name: Triku
description: Meet Triku, a flying action-adventure platformer that's made for fans of Monster World IV and Shantae. Set in an undescribed world, you must work through tasks with wide difficulty for each area and cute spooky characters to dialog to for more information about the game.

name: Forlorn Souls of Wicked Past
description: "Eldritch Verdict": A dark fairy tale turn-based card game. Strategic planning and battle execution shape your adventure amid challenges. Progression customizes character growth for a deep, replayable experience.

name: Radiant Sea
description: Radiant Sea is a survival sandbox game that uses nuclear contaminated water discharged into the sea to cause marine pollution, thereby affecting human survival.

name: Lost Dream Chronicle
description: "Lost Dream Chronicle" is a 3D ARPG that combines campus simulation with a 3D sandbox Metroidvania. The story follows a young adult, "Xiao Nan," who after graduating from university, enters society as a high school chemistry teacher, only to find herself trapped in dreams.

name: Bakahazard
description: Embark on a journey of several can-be-seen-everywhere ordinary students from the "Breakfast High School" saving the world, in this simple traditional turn-based RPG that makes no sense at all.

name: Inspector Douglas's Diary
description: This is a detective game where you play as a middle-aged inspector searching for a terrifying serial killer in an isolated village. However, as a player, if you uncover the killer’s motives, you might consider whether to cooperate with them to achieve their goal of "killing THE time."

name: Spiritual Bond: Breaking the Curse, Intertwining Fates
description: “Anyone who is destined, please help us....” A text-based puzzle game themed around shrine Miko. Explore an abandoned village, ancient and mysterious shrines, and eerie sacrificial rituals by combining nouns and verbs. Gradually uncover the truth hidden behind the story.

name: Magic Realm
description: The story of Magic Realm begins in a small town nestled in a dangerous misty forest, where a series of mysterious events take place that propel the protagonist to the town's hidden truth.........

name: Transparent Her and Real Me
description: This game is a bishoujo game developed and published by Kawayi Play.

name: Abnormal Stairs
description: "Abnormal Stairs" is a game where you go down the stairs while looking for abnormalities.

name: Blind Date Simulator
description: A role-playing game where players will interact with various female characters and try to find their true love from them.

name: PsychoCudgel
description: Umm… Just a 3D precision platformer game about Journey to The West. Might be a bit difficult.

name: Mystic Explorer
description: Mystic Explorer is a treasure rogue game. Players will play the role of treasure hunter in search of treasure chests in the siege of monsters, defeat the ever stronger enemies, and bring back your own archive treasures.

name: Magical School Girls Battle Arena
description: Collect characters with unique skills and win the arena! Find the optimal formation from three characters randomly selected for each round.

name: NeveRossa: Mille e una notte
description: That day, the sky was also snowing scarlet— Classic PC game from Firedog Studio in 2005 "NeveRossa~Mille e una notte" Remastered! Nurture a pretty girl Lilies, the "Goddess Seed", through trainings, adventures, and battles, into a true Goddess within a thousand nights!

name: Jitaku Keibin
description: Sin descripción

name: Colorful Life Simulator
description: Colorful Life Simulator is a life simulator that combines text and dynamic comics. In it, you can experience carefully arranged different lives by choosing different paths, from birth to old age, from construction sites to celebrities, and experience a complete and exciting random life!

name: Crossing Miracles
description: "Crossing Miracles" is a 3D shooter from northwest China, set in a zombie-ravaged post-apocalyptic world. Drive a unique tricycle through a detailed rural setting and battle relentless zombies in a thrilling survival adventure.

name: Wasteland Chronicles
description: Wasteland Chronicles is a card based turn based combat game adapted from ancient mythology, featuring forty different styles and skills of Wasteland gods who will help players complete their journey from Chaos to the Jedi Sky Pass.

name: Budding Destiny
description: "Budding Destiny" is an interactive love game where players guide the male protagonist from meeting his love in junior high to a committed relationship in high school. Players' choices shape the story, filled with warmth, romance, and youthful memories.

name: Pingcheng Chronicles
description: Pingcheng Chronicles: Pioneering the ARPG Genre with Chinese-Style Battle Royale and Entwined Partnerships[

name: My Strongest Girlfriend
description: "My Strongest Girlfriend" is a super-popular card competition game. Here, you will meet hundreds of beautiful girlfriends with unique personalities and characteristics. They will accompany you on this journey full of fantasy and surprises. adventure journey.

name: My College Picture with Them
description: My College Picture with Them is a short galgame game produced by Tsukino Shosha, which showcases the relaxed college life through the stories of two female protagonists and resolves the conflict between the" playing house style "within the student union and the club.

name: Looking for Something
description: The objective of the game is to find what you are looking for, which appears randomly on the map. Please get a hint and proceed through the map relying on that information, or else you may get a hint, which you can use to recommend the game to your advantage.

name: Fallen Deities
description: Fallen Deities is a multiplayer PVE game for 1 to 4 players. The player takes on the role of a Fallen Deities agent who travels to the location where Deities has appeared, players can uses various items to determine the identity of Deities, also develops the correct method to capture the Deities

name: Saving Diary
description: Saving Diary is an independent single player storyline card game. A game gift unexpectedly led the female protagonist Hua and her childhood sweetheart Ma Hai into an unknown world. In order to save herself and Hai, Hua embarked on a series of adventures alone in the card world.

name: Star Fire
description: This rogue-like action game will get your adrenaline pumping, combining exhilarating combat with deep strategic building! Every adventure is a brand-new beginning, you'll unlock new talents, hone your skills, and create powerful skill combinations to destroy groups of monsters ultimately! Ready？

name: Shinde Shinde Tsuyoku nare!...?
description: A deadly RPG with a new system that makes you stronger by dying and suffering.The graphics are a combination of dots and 3DCG, and the scenario is massive and branching. No matter how many times you die. No matter how many times you die. Don't give up hope.

name: Gokusaishiki Sushi Taisen: Proud Tradition vs. Crazy Imitation
description: Fire your "shari" and deftly deflect their projectiles with "neta"!Utilize these two types of attacks to defeat the ultimate heretical sushi waiting at the deepest level!

name: Touhou Seisenei: Forlorn Souls of Wicked Past
description: Join Gensokyo's strongest line of defense to protect the realms against a sudden incredible swarm of human souls! Inexplicable in origin, play as Reimu Hakurei, Marisa Kirisame, and Ichirin Kumoi to search for the source of this skirmish, putting an end to it before time runs out for good...

name: Canis Major Alpha
description: This is a story about finding courage. You will play and control two elves exploring the inner world of a girl named Ming, who suffers from depression. As you collect items to find the courage, the story of Ming gradually unfolds...

name: The Trouble: Defense
description: This is an ordinary tower defense game. If you are not satisfied with the existing content, you can leave a message in the comment area or our QQ group. We will try our best to make this game better.

name: So Hungry
description: So Hungry is a casual idle game. Come and collect various animal and plant cards!

name: Shissou shita Yuujin no Heya ni Nokosareteita Game
description: Would like you to solve the mystery contained in the game.

name: 8-man Iriguchi
description: Trapped in a shrine, you must navigate by following rules: proceed unless anomalies occur, turn back if anomalies are found, and reach Hachiman. This walking simulator, inspired by exits like "8 Hachiman," includes sound-based anomalies and mild horror elements. Playtime: 20-60 minutes.

name: Oshukuju
description: This is the story of curse and blessing hidden under a bloodline. Tamako wakes up to see an unfamiliar ceiling. She seeks an escape from the mansion, through traces of distorted feelings. “Novel-to-Experience” Adventure Horror.

name: The Throne of the Monster
description: The Throne of the Monster is a female protagonist fantasy-style AVG.You will play a "monster" trapped in the human world and embark on an adventure in order to escape.Cities in chains,human beings without tears,betrayals of a thousand years ago...Finally, judge the pale world of love and hate.

name: Yumezame no Kasetsu
description: Sin descripción

name: Cursor Kingdom
description: "Cursor Kingdom" is a medieval fantasy-style tower defense strategy game. Plan and use your cursor resources wisely to build defenses and repel the invading goblin hordes, protecting your kingdom!

name: J8 Princess Rhapsody
description: Chinese love simulation, with different styles of female masters began a fantasy journey, and in the process of contact with them in-depth understanding.

name: Kimi to Kanojo no Lily Vaganza
description: This is a Yandere Yuri horror game where character sprites and still images move smoothly, created using Live2D and TyranoScript. If you enjoy Yandere Yuri horror filled with obsessive love, we highly recommend giving it a try.

name: Toshokan de ha Oshiuka ni.
description: Build various builds by combining stolen books, fire guns with loud explosions, sneak into the library that changes every time you enter, and steal the legendary old book from the head librarian who sits at the far end of the library!

name: Tsubame no Sedai
description: A young man, rational and cold-blooded because he has lived on the battlefield since childhood, is attacked and injured by bandits. Injured, he takes refuge in a nearby abandoned shelter. There he meets someone. She is an android girl who was manufactured in the olden days as a babysitter.

name: Human Beings' Extinction Day: 2074
description: "Human Beings' Extinction Day: 2074"is a text-based visual novel game with a sci-fi and suspense theme. After an unprecedented disaster caused by an accident, the future of humanity seems bleak. Until April 9, 2074, a pivotal event that would shape humanity's fate occurred……

name: Xian Xia Di Chen Lu
description: Xian Xia Di Chen Lu is an open world ARPG game that includes real-time combat, dating development, and multiple plot side options. Its unique feature is that the combat system adopts a rare move mode in RPG genre, hoping to bring players a different experience.

name: No Give up
description: No Give up is a 2D Rouge+ strategy combination game.Heroes from different worlds are thrown into an unknown uninhabited planet, where there are only monsters and perhaps gods.Take up weapons, choose rewards, fight with monsters, and leave a legend of the unyielding……

name: Survivors of the Three Kingdoms
description: A barrage shooting game similar to vampire survivors, using a hand-drawn style, allowing players to enter the troubled times of the Three Kingdoms and see how long they can last.

name: Zoul Dungeon
description: is a strategic dungeon defense game where you take on the role of a dungeon master. Summon monsters, upgrade your lair, and set traps to fend off waves of greedy adventurers. Protect your treasures and prove your worth as the ultimate dungeon overlord!

name: Zup! Y
description: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Zombie Survivors
description: Fight against thousands of zombies and evil creatures in this action roguelite. Collect cards, pets, characters and evolve them to become strong and not become zombie food.

name: Carmen Sandiego
description: The scarlet super thief Carmen Sandiego is back! Adorn Carmen’s signature red hat and play as the vigilante herself to navigate a world of espionage, utilizing high-tech gadgets, and ultimately capturing VILE. Rookie gumshoes and seasoned detectives are invited to put their sleuthing skills to the test whether it’s in the narrative driven main campaign or the classic mode ‘The Acme Files’.

name: GB Studio's 5th Anniversary
description:
GB Studio is 5 years old!

Join us on a journey through all the major releases of GB Studio an see how far the software has come over the last five years.

Created by the team at GB Studio Central

Programming by RubenRetro

Art Advisor - 2bitcrook

Theatre Song by Beatscribe

name: Light Magic 2
description: Light Magic 2 is an RPG made in RPG Maker 2003.

name: Children of the Flower
description: You are Daisy — spunky, ambitious, and totally fed up with your town's local cult and their "deity": a giant sunflower. Under the gaze of your powerful father, a gang of anarchists send you on a secret mission with an unspeakable objective... to exterminate the Godflower.

name: Tinkercore
description:
An rpg about collecting robots and upgrades!

This entire game and etc. was made in only 8 days!

name: Inside a Dead Skyscraper
description:
Inside a Dead Skyscraper is an experimental game that also serves as a music video game for the song The Building by Jesse Stiles. The developers pose it as an answer to the proliferation of music and rhythm games like Guitar Hero, that capitalize on already successful music to generate more royalties for the music industry. This title aims to tie independent music and independent games.

Based on Stiles' brief tenure as a videographer in the partially destroyed buildings surrounding the World Trade Center site, this game recreates that moment with a character in a hazmat suit who is given a device by a colleague. He can then fly around the scenery and read the thoughts of the different people at the site, while everything else appears to be frozen in time. There are no clear goals aside from exploration, but there is at least one puzzle that can be solved. While playing, the theme song is played in the backgroun

name: Usurper Ghoul
description: An exploratory game about a fallen kingdom. Made with GB Studio, PyxelEdit, and Milkytracker by evandahm.

name: Minecraft: Fantastic Fairgrounds
description: Discover how to and unlock the power of AI through a wondrous world! Practice the skills to understand, evaluate, and utilize this exciting technology. Shape the future with AI literacy!

name: Girl Who Shrunk the Neighbors
description: On the weekend your neighbor's step sister invited friends over to his step mom's house so they can all meet up. When they played music, you and the other neighbors didn't like it and complained. At your neighbor's home with your girlfriend, all of you then suddenly get shrunk to the size of bugs.

name: Worlde Lande Countrie
description: World Lande Countrie is a 2D platformer game about strange-looking blokes doing strange things.

name: Minecraft: 1st Animal Friends Skin Pack
description: The "1st Animal Friends" Skin Pack will charm you with its warm appeal. Using a rustic wardrobe and farm-themed accessories, you may create a character in a world full of charming farm animals and hardworking farmers.

name: Xenogunner Returns: Rule of Chaos
description: A fast-paced boss-focused action platformer!

name: Whispered Secrets: Everburning Candle - Collector's Edition
description: A fire at the local asylum takes on a supernatural life of its own! You’re called in to investigate and find dark and shady dealings behind the scenes, with the lives of several patients at stake. Who are these so-called ‘outcasts,’ and why are they really here? Douse the flames on this mystery as you explore hidden-object puzzles and solve mini-games!

name: XGA
description: This is a Metroidvania aiming to continue Metroid Fusion's focus on horror and the SA-X. Explore a huge, interconnected space station, fighting various monsters, upgrades and boss battles. Avoid XGA as getting caught means certain death....

name: Yaysuu's X-Treme Adventure
description: Yaysuu's X-Treme Adventure is a side-scrolling 2D Platformer starring YAYSUU the Stickling, and his older brother Teddy.

name: Untitled Experimental Platformer by KG
description: A 2D platformer where you'll be able to explore an open world, use different double jump types to tackle different levels, and be able to make your own route through the game.

name: Biophage
description:
You are a single-celled organism.

Climb walls and ceilings, and find new ways to build up and maintain speed!

Punt your enemies into the air and finish them off with a grab and slam!

Explore the strange ecosystems laid out in your path, and feel the essence of nature!

name: Pillow Legends and The Last Nugget
description: A platformer in which you can spend time alone or with friends.

name: ChromaZone
description: ChromaZone is a game about a man just taking a casual walk around his home island Prismara Isle although suddenly an unfamiliar Robot native to the island appeared before him with his flying saucer-type machine he flew with. he morphed his body into a ball-like shape as he would fly away turning his friends into more or less puppets.

name: Bao Bao's Cozy Laundromat
description: Relax in Bao Bao’s Cozy Laundromat, an idle game where you join Bao Bao, a charming panda, in creating the coziest laundromat. Purchase colorful washing machines, add delightful decorations, and hire panda helpers. Watch your cozy laundromat bustle with life, even when you’re not around!

name: Noisz Starlivht: True Heroes
description: A continuation to NOISZ STARLIVHT "False Timeline"'s story rather than a full fledged second game. True Heroes marks the end of the NOISZ saga.

name: Playman Extreme Running
description: Playman Extreme Running is a Java parkour running game starring Playman and his sister Blaise.

name: Playman Extreme Running
description: Playman Extreme Running is a Java parkour running game starring Playman and his sister Blaise.

name: Broadtrip
description: Furry RPG made in OHRRPGCE.

name: Ragdoll Cannon
description:
Ragdoll Cannon is the shareware version of a popular Flash physics-based browser game. Each level is a screen with simple graphics, where the objective is to shoot humanoid stick figures from a cannon towards the switch, usually a box with the words "HERE". Many obstacles are in the way, like ropes, bricks and boulders that react with each doll impact in the simulated physics model. Swirling portals transport the flying figures to another point in the screen. There's no limit of time or to the number of shots available.

The full version has 150 levels (20 in the shareware version) and three additional music tracks.

name: The Displacement
description: Sin descripción

name: Splatoon: Torrential Climb
description: A short 2D platformer fangame based on the Splatoon series, made for the first Mario Fan Games Galaxy Game Jam, where it got 4th place.

name: AMTAG: Another Medieval Themed Adventure Game
description: Sin descripción

name: An Alien's Work is Never Done
description: Sin descripción

name: Cut It
description: A small game about cutting stuff.

name: Platform
description: Humans are imprisoned on a platform filled with evolved creatures. Scientists investigate that the creatures feed on fear. Are you ready to survive and face your dark fears?

name: Supernatural: The Game
description:
Supernatural: The Game. The game will consist of 5 parts, 1 part will tell the story from the childhood of the Winchester brothers and their first encounter with the supernatural. The remaining parts will tell the story of Dean Winchester's development as an independent hunter of evil spirits.

The release of part 1 is planned for 2024, which will be exclusive to VK Play and will be distributed free of charge.

The game will be available in two voiceovers - with actors from Lostfilm and actors from Novafilm.

name: CalorieMate Liquid for Game Creators
description: Transform into a can of Calorie Mate LIQUID that jumps out of the fridge and deliver nutrition to a game creator hard at work. This action-adventure takes you on a journey through an apartment room.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Dungeons of Infinity
description:
This game is a procedurally-generated rogue-like ‘Link to the Past’ dungeon crawler. It’s not a rom hack, it was created in Gamemaker Studio from scratch using the original assets. Many new features and assets were added to this game, but special care was put in to ensure it still looks, feels, and plays like the original game.

The goal of the game is to descend through the many enemy-infested dungeons to defeat Link’s nemesis, Aghanim. Along the way you will find many weapons, items, and treasures that will help you along your quest.

name: W3Champions
description: W3Champions is the ladder made by and for the community. It adds many new and old features to the game, such as a sophisticated matchmaking system, updated map pools, custom hotkeys and various QoL improvements.

name: Drone Simulator VR
description: Delivers a realistic VR drone flying experience for both beginners and seasoned pilots. The simulation features accurate flight dynamics, with three control modes and flight modes like Tripod, Position, and Sport. Players can explore various maps, tackle challenges, take photos with adjustable camera settings, and find hidden collectibles. Time trials of varying difficulty allow players to test their skills.

name: Stargate Network
description: Fan-made video game (fangame) based on the Stargate franchise. Explore Stargate Command, the Pyramid of Abydos as well as pilot a Puddle Jumper and more.

name: Beyond Reach
description:
Beyond Reach is a DLC sized mod that takes place in the east of High Rock, commonly known as The Reach. You will experience a story of intrigue, conspiracies sowed by both men and gods, and the struggles of those in the most squalid situations.

The reach, a land of grey skies with no respite beneath them. Where the soil is drenched with the tears of Kynareth and the love of Mara has little haven.

Where a pox ravages the lands to the west, and threatens to spill further to endanger the whole of Tamriel.

Take your adventures beyond Markarth to encounter a new spiteful realm, full with danger and the shelter you find isn't free from the horrors outside.

Is this despair caused by the people? Or by some force that lurks beyond the ether? Do the Witchmen act on their own behalf? Or are they the puppets of something much more sinister?

These questions will be found out as you trek your way across quagmires, cliff faces, dense valleys and the bitter cold.

Exploration is a key feature of this mod, with multiple shortcuts and unlikely routes making your trek across the region more exhilarating, yet more dangerous.

Quality voice acting and an engrossing Main Quest will have you immersed in the harrowing story of a downtrodden land and people.

name: Skygerfall
description:
This is an Alternate Start mod where you can play through the entire Main Quest of TESII: Daggerfall in the TESV engine, at the end of which you can choose to continue your character's adventures in Skyrim, taking all your loot, experience and new spells with you! It is now listed under Quests and Adventures, since there is no New Lands category.

They said it couldn't be done... Daggerfall is too big to fit in the TESV engine... And they were, on the one hand, right! You cannot capture the grand scale or the nearly endless possibilities that exist in a world larger than England! Yet, for all of its vastness and promise, Daggerfall remains a world unfamiliar to many Elder Scrolls fans. The mechanics and graphics feel dated to say the least, and its sometimes unreasonable time limits for quests as well as quest-breaking bugs left many players, even back in the '90's, so frustrated that perhaps a majority of players never finished the Main Quest, preferring to simply explore the world on their own terms, joining guilds or Knightly Orders, or becoming a vampire or a wereboar. And that is a shame, because the Main Quest is actually quite a good story. The purpose of this mod is not to replace TESII: Daggerfall, but to bring some of its magic and lore to Elder Scrolls fans of the Skyrim generation that would never otherwise experience it, as well as perhaps delight those fans of the original game that would love to see the Main Quest in an updated engine, complete with voice acting, re-mastered music and better graphics.

Please note that the Main Quest of Daggerfall is NOT about choice. You are role-playing as the Emperor's friend on an important mission, so, while the order in which you tackle these quests is your choice, it is assumed that you want to finish the Main Quest and so you will not be able to refuse the quest-givers' requests. At this point, there really isn't much of anything other than the Main Quest for you to do in Daggerfall, anyway!

I have worked on this mod in my spare time for a little over two years, and have had a lot of fun learning about various aspects that go into making a large mod the size of a dlc. I'm not much of a 3D artist, so I've had to rely on a lot of resources to put this mod together, and you will see that the credits list is quite long. I have tried to include, where possible, those models from artists who have made resources to see something from Daggerfall come to later Elder Scrolls games, such as JMan0WarS, who remade Privateer's Hold for Morrowind as well as Direnni Tower for Oblivion, Lord Berandas and BobJohnson99. As per Bethesda's instructions, all assets included in this mod for Skyrim have been remade, and not simply ported from the original Daggerfall game.

name: Life Without You
description: Life Without You is a simulation of sitting at the computer, immersing you in the harsh atmosphere of Patience.

name: Mirage 7
description: Mirage 7 is a dark fairytale, a third-person adventure with a unique blend of fantasy and sci-fi. The young Nadira travels the desert with her pet lizard companion Jiji, searching for a lost oasis - where she hopes to find a way to save her sister.

name: Legend Pirates
description: Legend Pirates is an online pirate MMORPG, where the seas are your playground. Sail, battle, and craft your legend in an immersive world. Join us on an epic voyage!

name: Ravensthorn
description: RPG sandbox taken out from fairytales, myth and folklore. Join and get immersed in a world like no other and pave your own path.

name: Vampires Fable
description: Vampires Fable is a coop, adventure, story-driven game for two players, combining the best of escape room games, puzzle games and arcade games. None of the players will be able to solve the puzzle alone. Whether you manage to find your way back to each other depends only on your communication.

name: Miss Rosen's Wowtastic! Marching Band
description:
The band is in town, and it’s time for some fun!
Join Miss Rosen, a clockwork majorette escaped from her music box, as she travels the world solving mind-bending puzzles that’ll test your luggage-packing skills to the max!

name: Beyond.Frontiers
description: In beyond.frontiers, you take on the role of an intrepid explorer, free to venture through the universe and beyond the known boundaries of three empires to discover new systems, encounter friends and foes, and engage in thrilling battles. With a large, freely moddable universe and several storylines, this game promises an unforgettable adventure where every decision might shape the fate of the galaxy.

name: MultiVersus: Season 3 - Sugar, Spice & Everything Nice!
description: Season 3 comes to MultiVersus with a dash of Chemical X from the Powerpuff Girls! All the way from Themyscira, Nubia joins the heroic line-up Mid-Season.

name: Lootist
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Legacy Bundle
description:
Well, the day has come. As promised, Sonic Generations has officially been delisted from Steam. If you were one of those who due to whatever reason didn't get the game in time, don't fret just yet! Because as also promised, a new "legacy bundle" has just been released onto both Steam and Xbox (without any formal announcement, oddly enough) that includes the original Sonic Generations plus its Casino Night DLC. As for what else is included, take a gander below:

Sonic Adventure + DX DLC
Sonic Adventure 2 + Battle DLC
Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode 1
Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode 2
Sonic 3D Blast (Steam Only)
Sonic Spinball (Steam Only)
Sonic the Fighters (Xbox Only)

name: The Wavy Tube Man Chronicles
description:
The Wavy Tube Man Chronicles is a modern FMV homage to Mad Dog McCree featuring Lloyd Kaufman and Wiley Wiggins.

Originaly released as free DLC for the Kinect-powered The Gunstringer, it received a standalone Windows 8 port for use with mouse or touch controls.

name: Office Jerk
description: There's a Jerk in every office. A know-it-all, overachiever who comes in early, stays late and kisses up to the boss. Exact revenge on “that guy” with Office Jerk: grab whatever you can find, and hurl it at him!

name: Office Zombie
description:
You don't have to be an Office Jerk fan to love Office Zombie: the undead hit, where a casually funny zombie apocalypse meets the 9 to 5 office grind.

Use your makeshift arsenal to torment Zombie, just like old times! Grab whatever you have nearby: an explosive teddy bear, a rusty saw blade, your trusty hatchet, or even a Cadaver Heart to torment the undead Jerk to death - or should we say, undeath!

name: Back to Base(Q2)ics Jam 1
description: The Back to Base(Q2)ics Jam 1 Mission Pack contains 16 brand new maps, each with their own story intermission and offering hours of gameplay. There is also an expansive hub map containing a secret level and a boss map, bringing the grand total to 18.

name: Idiotic Dots
description: A person called Mr. Dot has assassinated the square president. He suffered the electric chair but after a deal with God he risen. Play as Mr. Dot and run around the weird town of Hammingham running away.

name: Flappy Bird
description: Flappy Bird is back and he is refreshed, reinvigorated, and ready to soar again.

name: Spiderling
description: Spiderling is an exploration platformer made as part of Stencyl Jam 2014 about a young spider trying to escape with its friend before a war between their species starts.

name: Minecraft: The Theme Park
description: The Theme Park is on the brink of shutting down forever!​ ​Set out on an epic journey to earn tickets, repair rides, and restore the park to its former glory!

name: Minecraft: Skin Pack 3 - Classic
description:
Complete your Skin Pack 3 - Classic experience with skins such as Minecraft - Zombie Pigman, The Dishwasher: Dead Samurai - Chef, and Blacksmith!

Crackdown - AgentHalf Life - Alyx VancePortal 2 - Atlas
Half Life - Barney CalhounBaronBlacksmith
Slam Bolt Scrappers - BomackCarpenterCastaway
The Dishwasher: Dead Samurai - ChefPortal - ChellAwesomenauts - Clunk
Left 4 Dead 2 - CoachBIT.TRIP RUNNER - Commander VideoToy Soldiers: Cold War - Commando
Conker: LIVE and Reloaded - ConkerMinecraft - CowThe Dishwasher: Dead Samurai - Dishwasher
Half Life - Dr RosenbergHalf Life - Eli VanceLeft 4 Dead 2 - Ellis
FarmerHalf Life - Gordon FreemanGuard
Half Life - Headcrab ScientistIttle Dew - IttleToy Soldiers: Cold War - Ivan
Joe Danger SE - Joe DangerGuacamelee - JuanAwesomenauts - Lonestar
Left 4 Dead 2 - NickPortal 2 - P-BodyCrackdown 2 - Peacekeeper
PeasantSlam Bolt Scrappers - PenyenLeft 4 Dead 2 - Rochelle
ScribeMinecraft - SkeletonHalf Life - The G-Man
The Gunstringer - The GunstringerVagrantAwesomenauts - Yuri
Slam Bolt Scrappers - ZephyrMinecraft - Zombie Pigman

name: Minecraft: Hermitcraft Season 9 Map
description:
Discover the crafty world of Hermitcraft: Season 9 with this free map. This world was made by a remarkable group of over 25 creators over two years, using only survival mode, in season 9 of Hermitcraft.

There are tons of megabases, minigames, and secrets to explore. Dive into their blocky builds and start your own adventure today!

name: Minecraft: Astronaut Training Center
description: Wondering what's beyond our Earth or how to drive the Mars rover? Learn more about space and what it takes to be an astronaut! Visit the Space Center and follow classes to teach you the basic principles of the universe and redstone. Feel like you know everything? Test your knowledge with the tests!

name: Dead Or Alive 5: Costume Catalog 47
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Or Alive 5: Costume Catalog LR49
description: Sin descripción

name: Gioventù Ribelle
description:
Gioventù Ribelle is a freeware FPS videogame published for the celebrations of the 150th anniversary of the Unification of Italy.
Made by Gruppo di Filiera dei Produttori Italiani di Videogiochi in collaboration with various government institutes, the game follows a young soldier in 1870 who, after recieving an order from General Raffaele Cadorna, needs to travel towards Rome in order to get a message to Pope Pio IX; during his journey the young Bersagliere will need to fight the Palatin Guard and the Pontific Army.

The game has only one level where you fight against enemies using a variety of weapons: a musket, a Colt Navy and a Chassepot rifle.

name: Big Time Gangsta
description: Build up your gang from the toughest bunch of STREET SOLDIERS, ex-cons and wanted crooks roaming the blocks. To survive and thrive in these dangerous neighborhoods you need to TAKE OUT RIVAL GANGS before they get to you first. HUSTLING and dealing, SHOOTING and stealing is the only way to take these streets, earn COLD HARD CASH and OWN THE CITY

name: VHScape
description:
You find yourself trapped in a haunted VHS rental store, can you survive their twisted games and escape?

Description:
VHScape is a short horror-themed walking simulator and memory game inspired by similar anomaly games.

Play Time:
20-90 minutes

name: Andy's Adventure Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Anika's Odyssey: Land of the Taniwha
description: Sin descripción

name: Another Way Out
description: Sin descripción

name: Baroque Darts
description: Baroque Darts is a darts game in the baroque serie for i-mode and EZplus, distributed by Sting Station.

name: Baroque: Become a Meta-Being
description:
The world collapsed due to the unprecedented disaster "Great Heat".
In this distorted world, people couldn't keep their shape as human beings.

You noticed that you became a Meta-Being "Grue"
and wandered around the distorted and ever-changing "Neuro Tower".

name: Proportionator
description:
Embark on a quest to steal the Proportionator from a top-secret facility in this short, 8-bit-styled platformer!

Proportionator features a sleazy little guy called Paavo, just scooting around town, when he hears of a high-tech device by Vicinity Industries that can shrink and expand objects at will. After snatching it, you'll have to help him escape the compound by resizing almost any objects around you. Are you built to scale this challenge?

Proportionator is an 8-bit-styled side-scrolling platformer featuring a total of five levels across different biomes, dozens of different interactable objects, as well as a unique soundtrack by Francca. The game was developed over the course of four days (96 hours) for the GMTK Game Jam 2024.

name: Picture Perfect Golf
description: The Windows port of Picture Perfect Golf features re-done main menu, incorporating standard windows layout, and also updating the in-game UI.

name: Anticipating Murder
description: Sin descripción

name: Kajipeet
description: Kajipeet is a local multiplayer game for 2 to 4 players. In this game you will have to try on the role of a marshmallow samurai and show your friends who is the main marshmallow here. Katanas, maps, bonuses and a lot of fun!

name: Miraibo Go
description:
The mobile monster-themed open world survival game! Get ready to tame various monsters with your friends and explore the world anytime anywhere! Hundreds of classic monsters await you in this exciting adventure!
Explore the world, capture monsters, fight enemies, build a base, and establish a new monster utopia together! More ways to play are waiting for you to discover!

Tame Monsters Hundreds of monsters await you!
More than 100 classic monsters with different skills and elements will accompany you on your adventure! Worried about not being powerful enough? Defeat bosses to improve your team strength!

name: Diffusion
description: Diffusion is a total-conversion mod in its own universe, based on Half-Life SDK and running on Xash3D FWGS engine.

name: Project Rogueteers
description:
Third-Person "PVE" Co-op Shooter with Roguelite Elements
In the year 3000, humanity's last stand against sentient AI is at a stalemate. Choose your hero and unite in the digital world in a showdown against shadow algorithms.

Enter the Nullverse.
Everything happens in a virtual multiverse, where each world offers a unique adventure waiting to be discovered.

Choose your upgrades, and customize each run.
This world is full of possibilities with random abilities, diverse enemies, and ever-changing maps, the only certainty in Project Rogueteers is uncertainty.

Unlock Rogueteers, and flex their abilities.
You'll discover a diverse array of characters, each equipped with their unique abilities.

Ass whoop challenging bosses in co-op.
Gear up and rally your teammates to devise strategic plans that will help you vanquish your foes and conquer every mission.

name: Nightfire Open
description:
Nightfire Open (formerly known as Afterburner) is a multiplayer Open-source reboot of James Bond 007: Nightfire on the Xash3D FWGS engine.

The game was originally released in alpha version 0.2 on Mod DB under the name Afterburner on November 27, 2019. Four years later the codebase of the game has moved to a new repository due to the original codebase being tied to the upstream engine's codebase, hence detrimental, and the game renamed to Nightfire Open. On August 8, 2023, v1 was released on Github.

Currently, the latest version is v5 and it was released on March 10, 2024 on Github for both Windows and Linux.

name: Ionization
description:
IONIZATION is a work-in-progress singleplayer 3D first-person shooter action and post-apocalyptic standalone video game, based on a custom Half-Life 1 SDK known as PrimeXT SDK and running on Xash3D FWGS engine. The main idea originated in 2011, being inspired by the Half-Life series, the modification Paranoia and other creations of the BuZZeR level designer.

An Intro Demo version was released on March 5th, 2024. It is an opening part of the storyline, which takes about 15 minutes to complete. This build performs an introductory function and it does not reflect the final quality of the project.

name: Operación Tigre Blanco
description:
Operation White Tiger was a Spanish interactive educational adventure that required answering basic questions about biology and anatomy, among others, in order to progress.
The story is about a secret agent named Hache who needs to rescue a lost albino tiger cub that was being studied by biologists in the Indian city of Bengal.

name: Loot Loot Goblin
description:
A fast-paced arcade-style treasure hunt set in a deep, mysterious pit full of shiny loot, deadly traps and vicious enemies.

Take control of a goblin equipped with a magical satchel and grab as much treasure as you can before running out of light.

name: Don't Pop The Balloon
description: You wake up in a strange room, with nothing but a cake in front of you. Your hands are locked, and your left hand is trapped under a hand guillotine on the table. Your task seems simple: blow up the balloon. But be careful, not popping the balloon might be the only way to survive.

name: Kudamono Drop
