description: Kudamono Drop is a game all about catching fruit! Slide your basket left and right as the fruits fall from the top of the screen. Catch as many small fruits as you can, but be careful! There are larger fruits that can't fit in your basket, so try to avoid them.

name: Maurice Sendak's Little Bear: Toddler Discovery Adventures
description: Little Bear and his friends have gathered together in the meadow. Clicking on any one of the characters from the main screen will bring the player to a learning activity. Each character hosts a different learning activity, all of which Little Bear is present for to explain how each activity works. All of the activities are designed to encourage early learning skills for children ages 18 months to 3 years.

name: Misión en África
description:
Mission in Africa was a Spanish educational interactive adventure that in order to advance you will have to answer basic Spanish language questions such as accents, punctuation marks and others.
The story is about a secret agent called Zeta who will have to go to Africa to find out why so many trees and crops are drying up in an area where there were no earthquakes before.

name: La ciudad perdida de los Kowane
description:
La ciudad perdida de los Kowane was a Spanish educational interactive adventure that in order to advance you will have to answer basic math questions such as multiplication, addition, subtraction and others.
The story is about a secret agent named Hache who will have to rescue an important archaeologist who was going to publish his discovery of a civilization on an island that had not been discovered before.

name: Deadly Heart Gambit
description: You only have 3 months left to live. Gamble for extra time in Alice-sama’s life-or-death game. Be careful — she wants to steal your heart.

name: Domovoy
description: Domovoy is a psychological horror game from the first person, the game takes place in a Soviet apartment in the late 80s. Are you ready to meet the Domovoy?

name: DC Super Hero Girls: Food Fight
description: Help the DC Super Hero Girls in this food fight face off against Poison Ivy, Cat Woman and Harley Quinn. Throw food at your opponent and collect power ups.

name: Orebound
description: Journey on a quest to find the Emberstone. Lost in the depths of time. The king has tasked you to find it buried in the mountains. Dig deep and automate mining in the mountains before you. Craft, discover runes, send precious metals and gems back to your kingdom. Grow, mine and find the Emberstone.

name: Slay or Fall
description: The player takes on the burden of a dark dungeon lord. However, a squad of heroes has come to his lands and intend to defeat the player. The task of the dark lord: to kill, expel, break the heroes before they reach him. Throughout the game, the lord is in his throne room and influences events indirectly. However, it is through such undermining decisions that the heroes must be overcome. In addition, the political situation in the dungeon lands is extremely unstable. Of the 4 nations, only one favors the player, the rest have to be taken into account and solve pressing political problems.

name: Abby Héroes en apuros
description: Abby, a girl endowed with amazing powers, and her friend Paul, will find themselves trapped with Clavoman, the most famous superhero on television, in a thrilling journey that will lead them to the very underwater base of Professor Hammer, a mad scientist obsessed with the superhero.

name: SCP-002
description:
SCP-002 is large fleshy anomalies with a small apartnet inside. what make it anomalies is everything inside (furnitures etc) is solely made of human.
You are dedicated as D-Class, you must find all furnitures inside the SCP-002 and marked them as same as it was before and more importantly, find the new furnitures.

name: Theatre of Pain
description:
Theatre of Pain is a Mortal Kombat-esque fighting game featuring characters and settings drawn from Roman history and mythology.

It features high-resolution SVGA rendered sprites and backgrounds, as did Mirage's previous fighting game, Rise Of The Robots.

It uses a six-button layout, with weak, medium, and strong punches/slashes and kicks. There are both single and two-player modes.

name: Fostiator
description:
Fostiator is one of several sample games that demonstrate the capabilities of DIV Games Studio development environment. It is a simple versus fighting game with four characters and three stages, using high-resolution pre-rendered sprites for characters and scenery objects. It is possible to play against the AI with three difficulty levels, against another player on a single keyboard, or watch two AI opponents fight each other.

There is no plot but the DIV Games Studio user manual gives short (and rather silly) descriptions of each character: Alien, an animated skeleton of an extraterrestrial warrior with sharp claws; Bishop, a bionic fighter; Ripley, the Earth's best gymnast; and Nostromo, an immortal warrior armed with an axe. The character's names are obvious references to the 1979 film Alien and its sequel Aliens, but the game has otherwise no relation to this franchise.

Fostiator was available as a free download from the official DIV Games Studio website. The entire source code of the game was also included with a copy of the DIV Games Studio suite.

name: Animal Jam Classic
description: Animal Jam is a safe, award-winning online playground for kids. Personalize your favorite animal, chat, play mini-games, learn fun facts, and so much more.

name: The New Sheriff
description: A shooter where you won't have to shoot everything, presented in black and white like classic westerns.

name: Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon S
description: With the world at peace, the nine senshi challenge each other for supremacy. The player chooses one of the five Inner Senshi, the four Outer Senshi or Chibiusa. The fighting takes place in various scenes in Tokyo, with the player required to beat the senshi opponent two times out of three. The camera zooms in and out, depending on how far the opponents are from each other. The player can use special control combinations to invoke the senshi's special powers. After beating the other eight senshi, the player must defeat Super Sailor Moon to claim the title of Super Senshi.

name: Bonesaw
description: Bonesaw is a turn-based psychological horror game with highly strategic gameplay and a stress-inducing saw mechanic. Plan your moves carefully to outsmart the devil or challenge the odds and gamble the fate of your fingers.

name: Shining Lore
description: Shining Lore is a cancelled Xbox and PC MMO.

name: Spider Riders: Battle for Arachna
description:
Spider Riders: Battle for Arachna was a web browser RPG based on the anime series Spider Riders, itself an adaptation of a series of novels.

The game's Combat consisted of players rolling dice and using a deck of cards they assembled in turn-based battles. It featured a customizable avatar character and spider, 15 single-player missions, online play, and a Guild system, where players would align with one of four mentors to compete and amass the most points during recurring events.

name: Summoner Symbols
description: Two friends try to summon a demon to fulfill their wish. Can you solve the riddles to figure out which symbols to use? An entry for Ludum Dare #55.

name: Princess Pajama
description: Sin descripción

name: To Bring Her Back
description: To Bring Her Back is all about solving riddles. Unravel mystic poems to discover the correct combination of symbols to draw, and summon demonic creatures that can aid two friends in their dark quest.

name: Moo & Move
description: Guide the hungry cow to its goal! Place directional tiles on the ground and choose to solve puzzles the easy or hard way—it's up to you! Watch as the cow follows your path to reach its tasty hay in this fun, kid-friendly game!

name: 1-2-Whopping Word Search!
description: 1-2-Whopping Word Search is sequel to "1-2-Word Search!" packed with all new features! This game now utilizes multiple grid sizes for both large and small puzzles. Each level now has a hidden word to find that will unlock new music, and there are more than 10 new background themes that completely change the look and feel of the game. 1-2-Whopping Word Search! is classic word search puzzle game with a TreeFall twist! Embark on a fun and relaxing journey solving word searches while listening to the TreeFall Radio!

name: Galactic Guardian
description:
From the developers at The Jumping Food Games comes an action-packed endless game that catapults you into the depths of space: "Galactic Guardian". In this colorful, neon-lit cosmos, you'll battle enemy spaceships, destroy asteroids and collect as many stars as you can!

Neon-colored space: Immerse yourself in a breathtaking, glowing galaxy that impresses with dynamic lighting effects and colorful design on every level.

Endless fun: Destroy enemy spaceships and asteroids in an endless game that never ends - only you decide how long you survive and how high your score will be!

name: Galidor: Defenders of the Outer Dimension
description: A 3D Action platformer video game tie-in to the TV Show/LEGO Toyline of the same name. It was originally being developer for PS2 and Gamecube consoles in 2002 but never released, leaving only the GBA game in it's stead. It would eventually release for Windows PC in 2005 as a bargain title in the UK, usually bundled with other LEGO games at the time. It was later included in the 2007 "10 LEGO PC Games Collector's Box".

name: Potion Stand Story
description: Potion Stand Story is a short visual novel/shop simulator, created for the NaNoRenO game jam in 2024.

name: Attack on Titan Tribute Game 2
description: A free-to-play game developed by a team of volunteers as a successor to the original "Attack on Titan Tribute Game" created by Fenglee. Based on the anime "Attack on Titan", the game revolves around high speed movement using the 3DMG gear.

name: Fixation
description: Fixation is a prequel to The Company of Myself. It is a puzzle platformer that focuses on smoky mechanics, like activating a switch by bouncing a smoke ring off of a wall. It also aims to discuss the various habits that people form and the ways that people behave depending on who is nearby.

name: Bishi Bashi Special
description: Sin descripción

name: OpenViva
description: OpenViva is an free and open source continuation of Project Viva. Viva is a VR and non-VR compatible game where you can interact with your very own AI anime character!

name: Viva Project
description:
Viva mobile is a non-VR compatible game where you can interact with your very own AI anime character!
It is an advanced AI simulation that can interact and respond to many of your actions in a dynamic way through inverse kinematics, complex behaviors, and currently over 200 animations. The character's mood is dynamic and responds to how you treat it. You can play with it, feed it, or just be friends with it.

name: Sweet Hazard
description:
Airdropped into a ruined city and surrounded by a zombie horde, you will fight an endless battle against the living dead.

Sweet Hazard is a top-down, run-and-gun shooter that challenges you to survive against impossible odds. Master your weaponry, steel your nerves, and never take your eyes off the dead – and you'll survive for as long as your skills hold out.

name: Puff.
description:
If Flappy Bird and Downwell did some baby makin' resulting in a love child with the shakes and a penchant for dubstep, this would be it.

With controls that work like hand churned butter, and be cold trippin' like Bob Dylan, you need to tap, shoot, dodge, and weave your way through a sewer full of slime balls, eyeballs, goofballs, and water balls.

If this game doesn't make you twitch, you are a robot.

This. Is. Puff.

name: Forsan El Majd
description: Forsan El Majd ( Knights of Glory ) is a strategy game played on the Internet browser and mobile devices. The game tells the story of the Islamic conquests in Persia, Africa, and Europe.

name: ChatBattlers
description: ChatBattlers is a Twitch Integration game releasing on Steam in September. Steamers have get an interactive 3D set of both Idle, and engaging game mods. Both Transparency support as well as a Stream-Safe LoFi sound track are included. Users can download the app in order to customize their slime with weapons, skins, costumes, and accessories to appear in other streams. Join streams to compete and wind Gems to purchase customization.

name: Afterlife Harem
description: What does Afterlife Harem have to offer?

name: Cowtastic Cafe
description: Mix drinks, buy new ingredients, and help your barista grow in this milky puzzle/management minigame.

name: On the Keyboard
description:
This is a keyboard action game where you control a virtual keyboard to carry a Sphere.

The controls are simple: just follow your intuition and press the keys. The virtual keys that correspond to the ones you press will move, and the Sphere will move in response to the force from the keys. Your goal is to carry the Sphere to the finish line without letting it fall off the keyboard.

However, you can't move the Sphere directly, so it often won't behave as you'd like. To manage this irregular Sphere behavior, you’ll need to quickly identify and press the right key from the 40 available. This makes the game more action-packed than it may initially seem.
Moreover, even though it's challenging enough to move the Sphere as intended, the path to the goal is filled with various obstacles that block your way. Overcoming these obstacles requires flexible thinking and skillful manipulation of the keyboard.

Additionally, this game also functions as a typing game, as understanding the spatial arrangement of the keys is crucial. It can improve typing accuracy for both beginners and experienced typists. Why not sharpen your typing skills while having fun with an action-packed game?

And be careful not to break your keyboard!

name: The Bonte Room
description: You find yourself dropped in a strange room, but are you smart enough to get out?

name: The Bonte Room 2
description: You find yourself dropped in a strange room again, but are you smart enough this time to get out? No doubt!

name: Apocolypse: Vel
description: Sin descripción

name: Appointment with Death
description: Sin descripción

name: Dick Tracy
description: The Mega Drive/Genesis port of Dick Tracy features upgraded visuals to go with the hardware compared to its Master System version.

name: Gunfire Reborn: Realm of Frost and Inkwash
description: The Realm of Frost and Inkwash is arrivingBrush and ink swing, frost chills the scene. Two new heroes Momo and Lyn are waiting to depart on a journey with you! Before the journey begins, Momo wields the calligraphy brush and brings us four unique and fantasy weapons from the painting world.

name: Arborea: Magnicidio en la Corte
description: Sin descripción

name: Low-Budget Repairs
description: Manage renovations in 90s apartment blocks! Focus on quick profit and cut costs wherever possible. Client notices defects? Tough luck, the money's already in your pocket. Every day brings new challenges and decisions that can lead to fortune... or trouble!

name: Street Racers: Hot Asphalt
description: Only thanks to this game you will be able to plunge into the world of modern street racing saturated with adrenaline and excitement. A large number of extremely fast races through the streets of the city of modern and historical St. Petersburg, which were connected in a common, extremely twisted story about the adventures of a young talented racer.

name: Dick Tracy
description:
Dick Tracy is a tie in to the 1990 movie adaptation of the classic comic strip. It is a side scrolling action game, where you control Dick Tracy as he moves through five stages, shooting gangsters with an assortment of weapons.

The MS-DOS and Atari ST versions looks and plays the same, the main difference in those versions is their distinct music due to hardware and the complete lack of sound effect during gameplay.

name: Dick Tracy
description: The Commodore 64 port was released 'as is', and a lot of features from the original version was either not working as intended or completely removed.

name: Dick Tracy
description: The ZX Spectrum port was coded from programmed from scratch and retains the same design but the graphics was re-done for the hardware. Another notable difference is that there is no sound.

name: Dunk Trickster
description:
Let's play a game. A real game. On the real streets. The rule is simple - score.

You can't even imagine where streeball can be played. Discover all the locations for your best shot. Want to play at the airport? This is easy! Jump on the planes like it's your playground. Or do you want to break through the glass before the dunk? You can do it here!

name: Dick Tracy
description: The Amstrad CPC port was programmed from scratch and features re-done graphics and has sound during gameplay.

Irving is a sheriff famous for hunting witches and taking them to the gallows. He receives a distress call from a small village, tormented by a witch... Arriving at the village he realizes that God has abandoned that place.

name: Paws & Clean
description: Sin descripción

name: Operation Bodycam
description:
"Operation Bodycam" offers an immersive first-person experience where players step into the role of a special unit officer, equipped with a body-worn camera that records all actions for later review. The game features realistic, tactical missions based on real-life police scenarios, such as hostage rescues and raids, requiring strategic planning and quick decision-making.

Players must navigate dynamic environments, adapt to various settings, and coordinate with AI teammates to succeed. Each choice has significant consequences, influencing the storyline and mission outcomes. A skill progression system allows for customization and improvement, while realistic graphics and sound add to the intensity of the experience.

name: Rabbit in the Clouds
description: A small game where you control a rabbit escaping from the darkness that is chasing him. You need to jump on clouds to progress and use soap bubbles to jump even higher. During the game, you can encounter several types of power-up bonuses to gain a temporary advantage.

name: Twins of Legacy: Elemental
description: Step into a unique adventure with Twins of Legacy! Play as a talented painter and a skilled musician, combining art and music to navigate through a world full of mysteries and challenges.

name: Calm Before The Storm
description:
It's Caleb's Sixth birthday.

It's time to cut the cake but Caleb isn't there.

Your mission is to find Caleb and protect him from the storm.

name: Clay Knight
description:
Clay Knight is a souls-like boss rush game. Heavily inspired by Elden Ring and other souls games.
The game has only 2 boss fights, tho the second one is particularly difficult.

This game solely focuses on the souls-like combat system.

name: My U.S. Trucking Skills
description: Sin descripción

name: My European Trucking Skills
description: Sin descripción

name: My RV Skills
description: Sin descripción

name: Overflower
description: Strategically merge flowers in the pot to score more points, but be careful to keep the balance in check!

name: Joy
description:
Joy is a unique 2D horror game that blends unsettling mini-games with chilling cutscenes. What begins as an innocent experience quickly turns sinister, drawing you into a dark, unpredictable journey filled with unexpected scares. Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of tension and suspense that keeps you on edge from start to finish. Are you ready to face the fear and discover the hidden terrors within JoY?

Prepare for a haunting experience like no other.

name: Designed to Climb
description: The mineshaft you were working in has started to flood with lava, time to make your escape! You'll have to use your massive robot to make your way up the mineshaft, but it wasn't really meant to be manned by a crew of just one... You need to keep all of its systems in working order if you're ever going to make it out.

name: JeliWave
description: JeliWave is a linear 3D platformer with the visual appearance of retro games from the 90s. Swing your way through various worlds, unlock new abilities and master the art of Jeli's grapple!

name: Town Keeper
description: Build a rabbit town and defend against the Fluffy Empire. Strategically place buildings and manage resources as your settlement grows, facing increasingly challenging invasions. Each victory unlocks new ways to play, expanding your options.

name: Yandere Minesweeper
description: You met a cute girl who seems to be into you, maybe a little too much. Can you defuse her desires?

name: Survival Run with Bear Grylls
description: a free-to-play action game that puts you in control of celebrity survivalist Bear Grylls. This running game tasks you with overcoming diverse terrain, from running through forests to boating across clear waters. This takes the running subgenre to the next level, with activities such as driving boats and going skydiving.

name: Shoshin Test
description: Become a subordinate of Detective Gumshoe and take an ability test. Register your grades in the ranking and compete with detectives nationwide for status!

name: Tears of Vanfell
description: Tears of Vanfell is an action-packed dungeon crawler with roguelike and hack-'n-slash elements. Choose between a wide cast of characters and climb the Mountain as you swap weapons and grow stronger as a team of up to four player in online Co-op.

name: Holo Pop
description: Let's liven up the broadcast together with talents and listeners! A Hololive fan game that's easy to enjoy by simply shooting and hitting! Despite its simple gameplay, it's a pinball game that you can enjoy strategically, collecting, and getting deeply involved in

name: Awesome Game
description: Four stories by children, turned into this chaotic and extremely awesome game! Made on commission for Kulturverket and Humlab Umeå.

name: Dog Man: Mission Impawsible
description:
Join Dog Man and the Supa Buddies on an epic adventure!

Dog Man: Mission Impawsible brings the beloved book series to life! Dive into this action-packed, humor-filled adventure. The key to the city has fallen into the hands of a supa bad guy, unlocking all the prison doors and releasing many evildoers. Help Dog Man and his friends chase down the supa bad guys in their most impawsible mission yet! Switch between Dog Man and his Supa Buddies, each with their own special abilities and gadgets such as Rocket Boots, Retractable Claws and Dirt Proof Pants. Together you can overcome challenging obstacles and defeat powerful bosses.

name: Festibattle
description: Sin descripción

name: Lobstpurr
description: A clicker game, with a 3d multiplayer function.

name: Hit the Button
description:
Hit the Button is a platform game in which the main objective is to press all the buttons in each level. It is a game comprised of jumping and platforming, puzzles and brain teasers.
Each level presents a challenge as it has different design ranging from easy levels where you will have to perform simple jumps and difficult levels with more complex jumps, with puzzles and riddles.

name: Run! Run! Lancer: Fate/Stay Night - Heaven's Feel
description: For once, Saber is stepping aside as the franchise's star to let Lancer shine in an 8-bit styled side-scroller game called RUN!RUN! Lancer!

name: Super Mario and the Treacherous Tower
description:
Originally made for the "SimpleFlips' Slide Hack Competition (2024)", "Super Mario and the Treacherous Tower" is a Rom Hack by MrComit the creator of "Super Mario and the Monstrous Manor".

In this Hack, Mario is tasked by Princess Peach to investigate a haunted tower in the middle of nowhere, which is the source for paranormal activities in the Mushroom Kingdom.
Now, Mario has to slide down each floor of the tower to track down the paranormal activity.

name: Jiggie. For Fun.
description:
Assemble jigsaw puzzles with your friends!
You can use your own pictures to create jigsaw puzzles and play with people online.
Customize your rooms, engage in chat conversations, play songs in a room, and even have some cute helpers to make your puzzle game even more interesting!

name: Music Blitz
description: Music Blitz was a fast-paced turn-based music quiz game by Spotify. The game had the players guess the song playing.

name: Guess the Intro
description: Guess the Intro is an unreleased mobile game by Spotify. The game was a music quiz where players had to guess what the song playing is based on the intro alone. Not much is known about the game apart from it's listing in the TestFlight Teraleak.

name: Genshin Impact: The Rainbow Destined to Burn
description:
Version 5.1 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New character: Xilonen
• New main story quests: Archon Quest, Chapter V - Acts III & IV
• New Tribal Chronicles quest: Children of Echoes - Act III
• New main event: Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Terra Nil: Vita Nova
description: Vita Nova is the first major update for Terra Nil, introducing 5 new missions, which means new biomes, nine new buildings, an updated world map, new achievements, new handbook pages, new music, a new animal and an overhaul of the wildlife system.

name: Remio
description: Complete Obstacles and Puzzle Races!

name: Sonic Islands
description: Sin descripción

name: Petit Hedgehog
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic AGES
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic The Hedgehog
description: Sin descripción

name: Astral World
description: Sin descripción

name: Lethal Weapon
description: The DOS port of the game features different graphics and different HUD. This port also has no sound besides just music.

name: Batman: Rogue City
description: Batman rogue city is a doom total conversion mod featuring the famous caped crusader as he works to take down his rogues gallery once again. The game controls similarly to doom eternal, using the zmovement mod as a base. Grapple up buildings, sneak up on thugs, and drive the batmobile in the best doom superhero experience to date.

name: Shut-in Vampire
description:
Oh no! Mayu’s in a pinch! She’s woefully behind on paying the rent, and her scary landlady, Miss Himemiya, has issued an ultimatum. Mayu needs to earn ¥100,000 by the end of October, or she’ll be kicked out!

Being evicted from her home would be bad enough, but Mayu has a secret: she’s actually a vampire. Mayu hasn’t been a vampire for a full year yet, and the church is keeping close tabs on her to ensure she’s been behaving herself. According to the stone-faced Sister Juriel, it’s the church’s standard policy to execute all vampires without a fixed address, lest they start roaming the streets causing chaos.

If Mayu can’t pay the rent in time, she won’t just wind up homeless: she’ll be executed! What’s a fledgeling vampire to do?

Assume control of Mayu and manage these tumultuous two weeks of her life. Help her raise money to avoid a grisly end, all while managing her stress levels and forming relationships with girls over the internet. You never know: come Halloween, Mayu might be able to land a date, and she might even get to nibble on a cute girl’s neck!

Do your best, and don’t let this upcoming Halloween be Mayu’s last! She’s counting on you!

name: Jessica's Bow Wow Bistro
description: Jessica's looking to expand her cupcake shop by dishing up premium pet treats! Get her Bow-Wow Bistro booming by baking yummy delights for pets and their owners. Dazzle guests with decadent décor and a kitschy kitchen where culinary creations appease the palates of people and pets. Master your time management skills and fetch lots of cash to earn upgrades and expand your shops. Create a menu of healthy, tasty treats to achieve big rewards in this 'off-the-leash' time management game.

name: You Can't Scare Me
description:
Create the ultimate scare-sperience in You Can’t Scare Me - a haunted house game where you can scare or be scared! Team up to scare your friends - or your friends can try to scare you!

Explore 8 creepy levels to find hidden treasures. Set scary traps to frighten your friends - and get points if they scream! Stay invisible and stage creepy encounters all around them - or appear in front of them as a terrifying monster to make them really flip their lid!

Can you freak out your friend enough to reduce them to a shadow of their former selves? Can your friend keep their cool long enough to find the hidden keys and escape the horrible nightmare you’ve crafted for them?

name: Christmas Escape 2
description:
Christmas is coming soon, somehow you are in a gray lab-like room.
Let's escape from here!

name: Cooking Stars
description:
Cooking Stars is a restaurant game where you prepare burgers, sushi, pizza, cupcakes, ice cream and hundreds of other delicious meals using recipes from around the world! Become both a chef and a waiter. Manage your own kitchen well and reap the rewards!
Choose from hundreds of upgrades and don't forget to decorate your restaurant to attract more customers!
Fun and effective culinary boosters!
Watch the waiter complete tasks in record time or keep customers patient as they wait. Use boosts at the right time to maximize your profits!

name: Christmas Escape 3
description:
Even though Christmas is coming soon, you are alone on a cold night field...
Let's escape from this situation.

name: Tam Tam Paradise
description:
An angel from heaven has been sent by God to help troubled souls on Earth. As a cherub in training, you dole out good deeds by way of slapping a percussion "instrument" in time to a stream of angel wings which descend on screen. Your archenemy in this exercise of rhythm aptitude rests in the dark and pointy tailed persona of a bat-winged demon girl. Musical flavor from around the world, represented by instruments from particular countries, provide the lullabyes and strident interludes to play the game to.

Two percussion controllers are included with each copy of Tam Tam. Players beat on the circular piece as well as the crescent shaped portion of the controller to the angel wing cues on screen.

name: World of Unlit
description: A movement based first person shooter. Your only mission is to destroy all the Statues. Developed by one person MaxyDev also going by just Maxy.

name: Timeship
description: Based on an obscure P&P RPG you try to solve the first murder on earth in 300 million years.

name: The Battle of Chickamauga
description: Turn-based wargame set during the battle of Chickamauga from 1863.

name: Coloring Pages: Lumberhill Tales
description: Iron your flannel and prepare your painting brush! Get ready for an incredible ride around the world in Coloring Pages: Lumberhill Tales. You decide the colors of each scene with a wide variety of colors, textures, brushes, and stamps.

name: Yttrium
description: Medium-sized map with a bit of nonlinearity. Designed for classic playstyle with 20-30 minutes playtime.

name: Lines Progress
description: Another one limit based project. The first level contains exactly 100 lines, second - 200, and so on ... up to 3200 lines on MAP32.

name: Berserker Raids
description: You have to defeat the Berserkers, automated war machines programmed to kill all life they encounter.

name: TheMightyInferno
description: TheMightyInferno﻿ ("TMI") is an E3M1 replacement, inspired by Inferno, with nods to all other Ultimate Doom episodes along the way.

name: I.S.I.S.
description: I.S.I.S. allows you to play as an indifferent, or malevolent, artificial intelligence trapped on a space station with a single human crew member.

name: Babe and Friends: Animated Preschool Adventure
description: Babe and Friends: Animated Preschool Adventure (aka Babe und seine Freunde: Ein Abenteuer für Kinder im Vorschualter, Babe y sus amigos: Aventuras para los más pequeños) is a video game published in 1999 on Windows by TDK Recording Media Europe S.A.. It's an adventure and educational game, set in a math / logic and pre-school / toddler themes, and was also released on Mac.

name: 1 Agile Altercation
description: 1 Agile Altercation is the sequel to 1 Fast Fight, there's two major differences this time though; 90 Minutes of mapping time instead of the previous 60 minutes and there's a full 32 new maps this time around from various mappers such as Meowgi, Master Medi, Spendoragon, Petyan, Phoenyx and TheLoneliness.

name: Little Pony Town Adventures
description: Run around sweet city and collect bonuses to open new ponies. Pinkie Pie, Rainbow Dash and the other ponies await for you!

name: Typing Jet
description: Typing Jet is an educational Java typing game released for Japanese mobile devices based on the Jet Set Radio series.

name: Tintin on the Moon
description: In September 1992, a port of Tintin on the Moon for the Sega Master System was set to release, however due to quality concerns relating to the port the game was delayed to a January 1993 release before being cancelled.

name: Aliens
description: Aliens is an unreleased Sega Genesis game based on the movie of the same name. The game was set to be developed by Konami and was going to be a port of the arcade game, although never released for unknown reasons.

name: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
description:
The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas is an unreleased racing game based on the movie of the same name for the Sega Dreamcast. The game was developed by Full Fat and set to be published by Swing! Entertainment in late 2000. Despite being based on the live action movie, the game itself had a cartoony artstyle which is more in line with the show rather than the series of movies.

The game was later cancelled and another racing game based on the movie was later released instead in 2001 exclusively for the PlayStation 2.

name: Memories of a Hedgehog
description: Sin descripción

name: Emerald Race
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Sketchhog: Episode 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Zones
description: Sin descripción

name: Temporal Shift: Flow of Eternity
description: Sin descripción

name: Dash Cats
description: Sin descripción

name: Rally Horizon
description: You are invited to the motorsport party, come join us and Make This Race Great!

name: Vampire Skills
description: Play with the vampire and use his skills in this online puzzle game. Choose the right skills to get through the obstacles with the vampire and complete the tasks in each level of the game.

name: Yōkaimaki
description: The blood moon has risen once again, meaning the yōkai (cryptids) have emerged from the murky depths of the sea. As the heir to the family restaurant, use your fishing and cooking skills to serve up some delicious yōkai sushi!

name: Cramunhão: A Sigil Tribute
description: Cramunhão is a tribute to John Romero's Sigil. It replaces the 4th episode of The Ultimate Doom. Inspired by the works of John Romero on Sigil, it started out as a single maps contest emulating the mechanics of Sigil, but ended up evolving into a full episode community project. It has contributions from well known mappers such as Daniel (NeoDoom, Final NeoDoom) and Deadwing (Ozonia, Moonblood), just as newcomers like Sca, who has made his first map ever for this mod (and also one inspired in the hospital his first son was born, at that very day).

name: Boulder Dash: 40th Anniversary
description: Embrace Rockford's roots and celebrate 40 years of the iconic game Boulder Dash. Relive iconic moments from the past and experience the legendary puzzle game like never before. Don't let time stand in your way – come back in time with us and relive those unforgettable moments today!

name: BloomTale
description: BloomTale is a cozy flower shop simulation game where creativity meets management. Arrange beautiful flower compositions that speak the language of flowers, manage your shop, and satisfy your customers in a world of blooming possibilities.

name: Pushing
description: 《Pushing》The game is mainly based on 3D box pushing. Players need to move the white blocks to their destination within the specified number of times.This game does not require players to complete one level before moving on to the next but it recommends players to complete the levels in order

name: It Fishes At Night
description:
IT FISHES AT NIGHT is a short, story based retro horror game about fishing. On your way to catch the big fish you've always wanted to snag, you meet a strange fisherman who quickly becomes a problem.

Can you escape?

name: 2.5 Dimensional Seduction: Angels on Stage!
description: Enjoy The Turn Based RPG like Gameplay and Strike a Pose in cosplay as Ririsa wants to show the world her love for her favorite character Liliel in this awesome storybased game!

name: Undesired Catch
description: Drive your boat through a desolate post-apocalyptic landscape and try to find all the pots to return home. Something is waiting for you hidden under the water.

name: Absolute-Full-Life
description: Colourful survival horror first-person shooter with manual weapon reloading and a mystery environment. Discover every secrets in an open world full of diverse enemies and hidden locations.

name: Reel Me In
description:
You're a high school troublemaker who was caught committing a petty crime. During your winter break, you had two options: fish trash out of a polluted river for a week or pay a hefty fine. Being as broke as you are, fishing it is. Luckily, you’ve been paired with two cute guys! Not-so-luckily, something doesn’t seem quite right with this water… Well, it’s probably nothing. Let’s hope you can "catch" a date with one of the boys by the end of the week before your community service is over!

Reel Me In is a short horror dating sim visual novel… with fishing?
Made for Winter Visual Novel Jam 2023.

name: Generic Fishing Game
description:
Sit back and enjoy a peaceful afternoon on the lake, fishing while surrounded by nature. Catch over 3 different types of fish as you fill your entire Fishing Encyclopedia.

Try to get the biggest fish from the lake, but most importantly: have a nice, relaxing time.

name: Hoshi no Furu Oka
description: There’s one at every school – the quiet, aloof girl that nobody really wants to get to know. But this one catches Chihiro’s eye when he discovers she's a fan of the cult British science fiction films he loves... and that really leaves him with very few options.

name: Fishing?
description:
A short atmospheric horror game revolving around fishing. You're alone at a lake in a forest, fishing at a dock.

But are you really alone?

name: Fishing for a God
description:
I come to you, reader, with a warning born of terror and despair. Deep in the heart of a forsaken lake, where the waters run dark and still, lies a twisted game of fate and peril. A fisherman's tale, once filled with dreams of bountiful catch, turned sinister by the unknown.

Catch fish and journey to the enigmatic market, hidden far to the west, shrouded in darkness and secrecy. There, an unworldly buyer awaits, inscrutable and foreboding. Be wary, for the coins that burst forth in the market's belly are no mere trinkets but carry a haunting aura of evil.

Yet, as you brave this treacherous path, beware the malevolence that lurks unseen. For in the shadows of ancient trees, treehuggers skulk, eager to snatch your hard-earned catch and curse you with a darkness that spreads through your very being. My skin, once tanned by the sun, now turns black like theirs, a mark of doom that lingers. We are them.

I implore you, weary traveler, to wield caution and wit, for the lake's dark secrets have claimed countless fishermen before you. Their dreams of riches and glory swallowed whole by the lake's insatiable hunger. Tread lightly, for it thirsts for more souls to claim, entangling its victims in an eternal struggle.

Your journey's end beckons in the shop beyond, far to the east. Procure the enigmatic items it holds, and only then may you dare to hope for liberation - to "release him." But I beg you, heed my warning and break the cycle of this wicked game. Turn back, return to the safety of your home shores, and forsake the haunting allure of this macabre endeavor. Your life, your soul, they are precious, and this game is nothing but a cruel, treacherous ruse.

name: Number Sums
description: Number Sums is a challenging number puzzle to train your mental arithmetic. The goal is to make the sum of numbers in each row and column be equal to the clues on the side of the board.

name: Velvet 89
description: How did the communist regime in Czechoslovakia fall? This hidden-object game tells the story of ordinary people taking part in the peaceful demonstrations that changed the course of history. Big crowds hide those, who want to tell you why they took to the streets.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Los Angeles
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Los Angeles landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: 100 hidden Cats: Kitty House
description: 100 hidden Cats "Kitten House" is a hidden objects/hidden creatures game. The player's task is to find all hundred cats on the map.

name: 101 Cute Dogs: Find & Paint
description: Find adorable dogs hidden in a beautifull hand drawn illustrationand unleash your creativity by painting them! Relax and enjoy this delightful blend of hidden object and painting gameplay.

name: Death Moon
description: DEATH MOON is a murder mystery death game visual novel inspired by games like Danganropa. However, ironically, in this "death game", death itself is not permanent. Every time you die, you open your eyes at the start of the loop forever trapped in an endless game of death and misery.

name: Super World of Goo
description: A Physics Puzzler where you build gooey structures to reach pneumatic pipes.

name: Human Spirit Agency: A Tragedy That Can Be Saved
description: A Chinese Touhou X Ace Attorney fangame where you play as members of the Human Spirit Agency to solve cases.

name: Gabenwood 3: 99 Hidden Yen
description: New adventure in finding objects at the parallel universe. Gabenwood needs you! Journey to alternative Asia to find all anomalies and save the World from destruction.

name: Darkest Mine
description: Darkest Mine is a roguelite action-plateformer with built-in co-op. Fight your way through monster-filled shadowy caves, take your pick from a large panel of abilities and weapons, adapt your choices, and create unique expeditions!

name: Hyper's Quest: Mystic Warp
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyper's Quest Reborn
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Frost
description: Sin descripción

name: Donnie the Chao Final Mix
description: Sin descripción

name: The Big Blow Up
description: Sin descripción

name: Allegro: The Melodic Warrior
description: Sin descripción

name: SCUD Race Plus
description:
Scud Race Plus (スカッドレース プラス) is an expanded version of Scud Race, released in 1997 for Sega's Model 3 arcade hardware. This rare and unusual update was exclusive to Japan, though the game's region can be changed. When switched to the US region, it transforms into Sega Super GT Plus. On March 31, 2017, Sega Logistics Service officially ended support for Scud Race Plus machines.

Scud Race Plus is largely identical to the original Scud Race but includes a few additional features:

New track: Super Beginner
Mirror course: Hold the START button on the track select screen.
Time Lap mode: Hold the START button on the transmission select screen.
Extra cars: Available only in Super Beginner mode by holding the START button while selecting a car.

name: Sonic Districts
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic NG
description: Sonic NG is a fan-made game in the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise. Players control Sonic and possibly other characters as they speed through levels inspired by classic Sonic games. The game likely features fast-paced platforming gameplay, with Sonic running, jumping, and spin-dashing through various environments. Sonic NG may incorporate both 2D and 3D elements, blending traditional side-scrolling sections with more modern 3D gameplay. As a fan creation, the game probably aims to capture the essence of classic Sonic titles while introducing new elements or improvements. Sonic NG might include original levels, characters, or gameplay mechanics designed by fans to expand upon the established Sonic formula. While not an official Sega product, Sonic NG represents the ongoing enthusiasm of the Sonic community for creating new experiences within the beloved franchise.

name: Sonic Adventure SX
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Adventure Reloaded
description: Sin descripción

name: Deadzone: Rogue
description: Deadzone: Rogue is a roguelite first-person shooter set in deep space. Slay hordes of enemies, loot powerful gear, and customize your loadout during each unique run. Uncover fragments of your past as you piece together the truth behind your mission. Fight. Die. Revive. Repeat.

name: Ardent Fever
description: Sin descripción

name: Yet Another Solitaire Game
description:
Yet Another Solitaire Game (YASG) includes the following solitaire games: Klondike, Spider, Freecell, Yukon, Alaska, and Scorpion,

Yet Another Solitaire Game is designed for fans of the Solitaire card game who want to test their skills against other players. Online tournaments start all day, every few minutes, according to various settings. Joining players must solve exactly the same hand at the same time. During the competition, the program monitors many factors and scores the competitors based on this. At the end of the tournament, players can compare their results.

name: Temple of Spider
description: Huge level for exploration and intense fighting.

name: UnNecessary
description: UnNecessary is a Doom II megawad created by scwiba, and a sequel of his Doom 1 three-episode WAD UnAligned. Much like its predecessor, UnNecessary features short, compact but experimental maps with sometimes unorthodox gameplay, and was built over the course of 30 days.

name: Heretic Invades Doom
description: Two small maps done with new complevel MBF21.

name: 10 Minute Massacre
description: Seven short Boom-compatible slaughtermaps that can be beaten in under 10 minutes each inspired by Micro-Slaughter Community Project.

name: Sustenance
description: A 5 map episode that takes you through a city, heading for a portal inside a shrine on the outskirts.

name: No, I'm Not A Human
description: An intimate story about a disaster and guests from underground. People are breaking into your home, but not all of them are true people.

name: Super Bo Noise
description: Bo Noise, a British, Noise look-alike, and cracker connoisseur finds out that the GLORIOUS MR GRAPE has stolen his valuable prized possession: TUC CRACKERS. This upsets Bo, so they follow the crumb trail to GLORIOUS MR GRAPE'S GLORIOUS GRAPE MANSION and they will not stop until they gets their crackers. You have three days.

name: Diluvian Ultra: Awakening
description:
Diluvian Ultra: Awakening shows a never-before seen part of Diluvian Ultra's story, preceding the events of the main game. As a young Diluvian Knight, stage a heroic defense against insurmountable odds, in this single-player FPS with a retro aesthetic and fast-paced, strategic combat.

Witness the events preceding the story of Diluvian Ultra in this free, stand-alone FPS. Embody a young Diluvian Knight, Qasar, and face the brutal Myrmidon invasion of your tomb-ship. Find and protect the sarcophagus of Attila, your Lord, and ensure he survives to set in motion the events of Diluvian Ultra.

Featuring a brand-new level, new characters, story and dialogues, Diluvian Ultra: Awakening is an excellent introduction for new explorers of the game’s universe, as well as an interesting new addition to veterans who have already completed the first chapter of Diluvian Ultra.

name: Area 51
description: Area 51, is a 3D singleplayer sci-fi first-person shooter game made with Xash3D engine.

name: Churip
description: "CHURIP" is a horror adventure game set in modern times. On the day of the funeral, her casket was beautifully adorned with many flowers. She often appears in my dreams as she was when she was alive.

name: Risk of Rain: Meridian
description: Meridian is a fanmade Risk of Rain expansion pack, adding new content to many areas of the game. It focuses heavily on the rich world of Petrichor V, both in its vast and lively stages, and a plethora of new enemies and elite types to inhabit them.

name: Nagaisan
description: I came to know "her." Since then, I've felt someone's gaze from somewhere. Memories of the place I reached while searching for a lost dog in the past. I'm not sure if it's connected, but I did something. "NAGAISAN" is an adventure game based on urban legends.

name: Her Little Sylvietower
description: A platformer by Sylvie in which you climb to the top of a tower. You can rewind time, to avoid death or fix mistakes.

name: Echo Chess
description: Daily chess online game.

name: Chick Room Escape: Xmas ver.
description: A banner-sized Christmas-themed escape game

name: Home Safety Hotline: Seasonal Worker
description: It's 1996, and there's only three days left until Christmas. Rebecca, a yearly seasonal employee at HSH, has been brought back to help answer the helplines during this busy (and deadly) time of the year. Featuring the talents of Trevor Henderson, Longmont Potion Castle and more!

name: Vampyre Crusade
description:
This is a story where you play as a holy knight and a Nun from a fictional religious order of knights. You both were requested to come to this castle in Romania for a royal event, which turned into a crusade of vampires from another dimension. You must rescue all the royal family from different type of blood-eaters like: Skeletons, Ghouls, Large bats, lesser vampires, Hellhounds, Werewolfs, Wraiths, Incubus, Succubus, Bi-Incubus Devils, Greater vampire and their cult of human followers.

It is a Souls-Like experience but with melee weapons and guns and crafting of healing items and crossbow bolts.

name: Totally Spies! The Mobile Game
description: Totally Spies! The Mobile Game is a mobile game based on the TV show Totally Spies! which was developed and released by GameLoft in 2005.

name: Tampopo
description: Tampopo is a heartfelt RPG adventure with unique physics-based combat. It is set in a strange world with strange characters. It is a lighthearted game that will make you laugh but it has a hidden darkness to itself which will gently unfold until it wraps all the way around you.

name: Virtua Tennis: Mobile Edition
description: Virtua Tennis: Mobile Edition is a J2ME installment of the Virtua Tennis series.

name: Quiz Planet
description: Quiz Planet is a fast-paced quiz game of intergalactic proportions where you can compete against your friends and other players.

name: Football Superstar 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Harborland de Tsukamaete
description: Sin descripción

name: Folk Song
description: Sin descripción

name: Hearts Online
description: Hearts Online is a multi-player Hearts game available for Windows. Just press play and you are matched up with human players from all around the world.

name: Cavescape
description: Escape a procedurally generated cave by grappling and swinging. Explore the depths of the ecosystem, fight foreign creatures, and upgrade your tools. Destructible environments, deep mechanics, and tough bosses!

name: Skylanders: SuperChargers
description: Exclusive to the Wii U version of the game is a special figure of Donkey Kong and Bowser.

name: Skylanders: Imaginators
description: Exclusive to the Wii U and Nintendo Switch versions of the game is a special figure of Donkey Kong and Bowser.

name: Rhythmscapes
description:
Guided by an inner-rhythm spirit, take part in rhythm practices set within immersive visual environments. Enhance your focus and coordination while discovering the essence of your rhythm. Engage in drumming sessions driven by the science of human emotions - all of this is achieved with just your bare hands, and no controllers are needed.

Rhythmscapes makes a groundbreaking leap, synthesizing mindfulness and rhythm-based game mechanics into a single therapeutic experience within immersive VR.

name: Stellifier
description: Stellifier - an otome game inspired by older idols An idol drama game about an older group making a comeback from retirement, featuring a GxB/BxB/non-binary romance!

name: Panic Road
description: Try to reach home through the streams of people trying not to feel panic, your complexes and thoughts will prevent you from going through all this social horror, but you can easily help the main character just by closing the bad thought through the cross! If only this could be done in real life...

name: Lost in Hieroglyphs: A Hidden Objects Expedition
description: Hidden Object Discovery: Find hidden objects in ancient locations and reveal lost treasures. There are a total of 180 hidden objects in 6 chapters.

name: Armageddon Margaret

name: Glingdom
description: In "Glingdom," you're a hero in a medieval world, battling enemies and bosses with a deck of cards. Beat enemy waves and bosses, buy cards to strengthen your deck, and unlock new cards. Each deck offers unique challenges.

name: Quiet House Massacre
description: Can you reveal the dark secrets hidden in a familiar old, quiet house? The truth awaits revelation!

name: Master Leaf Blower
description: Master Leaf Blower is a physics-based arcade game with a comic book twist. Become a leaf-blowing hero and save the city! Navigate unique districts, tackle fun challenges, and test your skills in this crazy simulator.

name: Laundry
description: A "Heisei retro" 3D horror game set in a 1990s Japanese laundromat.

name: Find All 5: Vikings
description: Hey you, warrior! Do you want to go to MeowHalla? Then grab your axe and sail with us to new lands full of glorious battles and rich booty.

name: Jump Ball
description: Jump to the top of the towers

name: Mech Wars
description: Long ago, the Stenian race lived in harmony on the planet Xelarvis, aided by their mechas. However, everything changed when the Kaxeder race arrived. They invaded the world with the intent to destroy and conquer it.

name: Sol Frontiers
description:
Engage in space battles, upgrade starfighters, and explore the vast galaxy!

Every sun has its shadow. In SOL FRONTIERS, every space battle in the galaxy is a step towards unraveling the mystery. Engage in turn-based strategy to illuminate the darkness in this space battle saga.

name: Project Hive
description: Enter the world of a not-so distant future, a reality where people transfer their minds into fully virtual environments. In this world, a new game, “Project Hive”, is the most popular form of entertainment - but what secrets does the Hive hold? Discover for yourself!

name: Tom Cruise's Kissing History
description: Play as Tom Cruise and make him kiss through his history of romantic partners, starting with Mimi Roger, without being noticed by others. The difficulty gets harder as each stage progresses.

name: Hillside Drive
description:
Have fun and take your car through challenges with realistic game physics in hillside drive racing game. Choose from multiple cars that each provide something different to overcome rocky terrain and become the best hill rider.
Race the challenges of unique hill racing environments with many different cars. Gain bonuses from daring tricks and collect coins to upgrade your car and reach even higher distances. The game seems to be easy, but it's hard to be the winner.

name: Remembery
description:
Memory games. Exercise your memory with brain games matching up pairs of cards
Brain games. Match pictures and find out how good is your memory! Pictures match games.
Train your memory, concentration, accuracy, attention, the speed of thinking and logic skills and much more. This game is a great way to exercise your memory and keep your brain fit!

name: Maze Dungeon
description:
Roll the cube to solve 3D puzzles labyrinth and find a way out from dark mazes
Maze Dungeon is a path or collection of paths, typically from an entrance to a goal.
Roll the cube through the labyrinth game.
Use swipes of buttons to drive the cube out labyrinths.

name: Hopscotch
description: Just keep tap tiles

name: Ball Rise Up
description: Rise up the ball higher! Challenge your friends for the highest score!

name: Another Random Idle RPG
description: ARI is a browser RPG game, where you have to manage a team of heroes to defeat a dungeon full of monsters
